anya-e0401n0:5_1: Paramatthadīpanīti ettha attho duvidho padhānatthoca pariyāyatthoca. Tattha padhānattho
anya-e0401n0:5_2: paramatthonāma, padhānatthotica padavākyānaṁ mukhyattho ujukattho. Pariyāyatthopi
anya-e0401n0:6_7: jātikkhetta saṅkhāte janambujamahāsare. Tattha jātikkhettaṁ nāmadasasahassa cakkavāḷaṁ,
anya-e0401n0:6_8: yaṁ ekaṁ buddhakkhettanti vuccati. Yattha ca mahābodhisattānaṁ buddhabhāvatthāya
anya-e0401n0:7_1: mahantaṁ mohatamaṁnūdati apaneti, saddhammaraṁsijālaṁ vissajjanto antaradhāpetīti
anya-e0401n0:8_0: Evaṁ buddhassapaṇāmaṁ katvā attanā icchitaṁ paṇāmappayojanaṁ pariṇāmento ‘‘sañjāta’’ntiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:8_2: suṭṭhujātaṁ, anamataggesaṁsāre daḷhaṁ pavattanti attho. ‘‘Tamokhandha’’nti mahāmohatamokhandhaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:8_4: saṅgahitāni eva. Tathā rogādayo antarāya dhammāpi tamojātikāevatamotamaparāyanotiādīsu.
anya-e0401n0:9_0: Evaṁ sappayojanaṁ paṇāmaṁ katvā idāni sanidānaṁ ganthappaṭiññaṁ karonto ‘‘porāṇakehī’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:9_1: Tattha nidānaṁ nāma ganthappaṭiññāya āsannakāraṇaṁ. Katadhaṁpanatanti, sāratthābhimānīnaṁ
anya-e0401n0:10_0: Tattha dvīhi gāthāhi sakāraṇaṁ yācanaṁ dasseti. Puna dvīhi gāthāhi saupamaṁvipulatthataṁdasseti.
anya-e0401n0:10_1: ‘‘Tasmā’’tiādinā ganthappakāra ganthaguṇehi sahaganthappaṭiññaṁ dasseti. Tattha ādigāthāyaṁ
anya-e0401n0:10_3: yojanā. ‘‘Vaṇṇanā’’ti porāṇaṭīkāyo vuccanti. Evañcasati kasmā abhinavaṁ vaṇṇanaṁ
anya-e0401n0:10_4: yācantīti. ‘‘Ye sāratthābhimānino, te tāhibahūhi porāṇavaṇṇanāhituṭṭhiṁ navindanti.
anya-e0401n0:10_5: Tasmā taṁ yācantī’’tiyojanā. Etena appasāratthā eva tāporāṇavaṇṇanāyotipi dīpetiyeva.
anya-e0401n0:11_0: Sāratthameva abhimānenti, visesena nandantisīlenāti sāratthābhimānino. Tenavindantītipurimenasambandho.
anya-e0401n0:11_1: Puna ‘‘te’’ti tāhi tuṭṭhiṁ avindantā tejanā. ‘‘Ma’’nti attānaṁ niddisati. ‘‘Saṅgammā’’ti
anya-e0401n0:11_2: samāgantvā. Yasmā paramatthassadīpanaṁ yācanti, tasmā imissāṭīkāya ‘‘paramatthadīpanī’’ti
anya-e0401n0:11_5: icchanti, tattakaṁvīti adhippāyo. ‘‘Dajjeyyuṁ’’ti dadeyyuṁ. Kāmaṁ dadantūti attho.
anya-e0401n0:11_7: ūnatāhānitā navattabbāva. Kasmā, aparimāṇa ratanādhiṭṭhānattā mahāsamuddassa. Yato
anya-e0401n0:11_8: so sāgaroti vuccati, sānaṁdhanaratanānaṁ gehagabbhasadisattāsāgaroti hissa attho.
anya-e0401n0:12_3: Parikkhīṇāti vuttaṁ hoti. ‘‘Nahessare’’ti nahessanti nabhavissanti. ‘‘Tasmā’’ti yasmāca
anya-e0401n0:12_4: yācanti, yasmāca pariyādinnānahessanti, tasmā. ‘‘Tāsuvaṇṇanāsū’’ti tāsu porāṇaṭīkāsu.
anya-e0401n0:12_8: Mandā buddhi yesaṁ te mandabuddhino. ‘‘Mandā’’ti mudukā. ‘‘Buddhī’’ti ñāṇaṁ. Mandabuddhino
anya-e0401n0:12_9: sotujane pabodheti vikāseti, ñāṇa vikāsaṁpāpetīti mandabuddhippabodhanā. ‘‘Karissa’’nti
anya-e0401n0:12_11: Paṭunoti byattassapaṇḍitassa. Pāṭavena attho yesaṁ te pāṭavatthino. Itisaddo parisamāpanajotako.
anya-e0401n0:12_12: So hi ganthārabbhavidhānassa idhaparisamāpanaṁ pariniṭṭhānaṁ ñāpetuṁ ganthārabbhavākyassapariyante
anya-e0401n0:14_0: 1. Evaṁ ganthārabbhavidhānaṁ katvā idāni ādigāthāya sambandhaṁ dassento ‘‘abhidhammatthasaṅgaha’’ntiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:14_1: Sambandhanti kāraṇapphalasaṁyogaṁ. Tattha gāthāpavattanaṁ kāraṇaṁ nāma. Pañcapiṇḍattha
anya-e0401n0:14_2: dassanaṁ phalaṁ nāma. Kāraṇapphalasaṁyogo sambandhonāma. ‘‘Sappayojane’’ti phalappayojanasahite.
anya-e0401n0:14_3: Ganthena abhidhātabbo kathetabboti ganthābhidheyyo. Nipatassa kammaṁ nipaccaṁ. Nipacca
anya-e0401n0:14_6: adhippetatthabhūtāti adhippāyo. Duvidhohi atthovacanattho ca abhidhānatthoca. Tattha
anya-e0401n0:14_7: gacchatīti gato, purisoti vuttegacchati padena vutto yokoci gacchanto vacanatthonāma.
anya-e0401n0:14_8: Purisoti padenadassito padhānattho adhippetattho abhidheyyattho nāmāti. ‘‘Abhidhammatthā’’ti.
anya-e0401n0:16: Cittaṁ cetasikaṁ rūpaṁ, nibbānamiti sabbathā. ti
anya-e0401n0:17_0: Evaṁ vuttā abhidhammatthā. Evaṁ vuttattāyevaca tecattāro abhidhammatthā eva idhapadhānatthabhūtāti
anya-e0401n0:17_1: ca, - padhānatthāeva idhaganthābhidheyya bhāvena adhippetāti caviññāyatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:18_0: Kecipanavadeyyuṁ, teabhidhammatthā saṅgahappakaraṇaṁ pattā visuṁ saṅgahatthānāmabhaveyyuṁ,
anya-e0401n0:18_1: naabhidhammatthā nāma. Idha ca saṅgahatthā eva abhidheyyabhāvena adhippetāti vuttaṁ
anya-e0401n0:18_2: abhidheyyo abhidhammattha saṅgahappadenāti. Vuccate. Teabhidhammatthā saṅgahappakaraṇaṁ
anya-e0401n0:18_3: pattāpi abhidhammatthā evanāma honti, na visuṁ saṅgahatthānāma. Tattha vuttābhidhammatthātihi
anya-e0401n0:18_4: vuttaṁ, natuvuttaṁ tattha vuttāsaṅgahatthāti. Evañcasati saṅgahitabhāvamattaṁ visiṭṭhaṁ
anya-e0401n0:18_5: hoti. Tadeva idha abhidheyyo nāma siyāti vuttaṁ ‘‘saṅgahitabhāvopi abhidheyyo yevā’’tiādi.
anya-e0401n0:18_7: Sā saṅgahitehi dhammehi aññā nahoti. Tesvevadhammesusaṅgayhatīti vuttaṁ ‘‘saṅgahitabhāvopi
anya-e0401n0:18_8: abhidheyyo yevā’’ti. Kiñcāpitehi aññānahoti, te sveva saṅgayhati. Sāpana ganthassapadhānattho
anya-e0401n0:18_9: nahoti. Idha ca padhānatthova adhippetoti vuttaṁ ‘‘taṁnasundara’’nti. Kasmā nasundaranti
anya-e0401n0:18_10: āha ‘‘nahiso’’tiādiṁ. Etthacahisaddo imassa vākyassahetuvākyabhāvaṁ joteti. Esanayoparatthapi.
anya-e0401n0:18_14: Sā brammaraṭṭhe tiriyapabbatavāsinā therenakataṁ cūḷaṭīkaṁ upādāya mahāṭīkāti pākaṭā.
anya-e0401n0:19_0: Ganthappakāroca pakāravantehi dhammehi sahevasijjhati, vinā nasijjhatīti adhippāyena
anya-e0401n0:19_1: ‘‘soabhidhammatthapadenā’’ti vuttaṁ. Kāmañca so tehi sahevasijjhati, vinānasijjhati.
anya-e0401n0:19_2: Abhidhammatthapadaṁ pana saṅgahaṇakiriyāpakāraṁna vadatīti vuttaṁ ‘‘taṁ nasundara’’nti.
anya-e0401n0:19_3: Duvidhaṁ nāmaṁ anvatthanāmaṁ ruḷināmanti. Tattha, atthānugataṁ nāmaṁ anvatthanāmaṁ,
anya-e0401n0:19_4: yathā sukhitassajanassa sukhotināmaṁ. Attharahitaṁ āropitaṁ nāmaṁ ruḷināmaṁ, yathā
anya-e0401n0:19_5: dukkhitassajanassa sukhoti nāmaṁ. Idha pana anvatthanā mantidassetuṁ ‘‘atthānugatā’’tiādi
anya-e0401n0:19_7: hoti. ‘‘Ganthasamaññā’’ti ganthasammuti. Ganthassanāmanti vuttaṁ hoti. Saṅgahaganthonāma
anya-e0401n0:19_8: pāḷiyaṁtattha tattha vippakiṇṇedhamme ekattha sabhāgarāsikaraṇavasena pavatto gantho.
anya-e0401n0:19_10: tassauggahoca paripucchācāti dvando. Ādisaddena dhāraṇādīni saṅgaṇhāti. Tattha pāṭhassavācuggatakaraṇaṁ
anya-e0401n0:19_11: uggahonāma. Uggahi tassapāṭhassa atthaggahaṇaṁ paripucchānāma. ‘‘Anāyāsato’’ti niddukkhena.
anya-e0401n0:19_13: lakkhaṇāvabodho rasāva bodhotiādiṁ saṅgaṇhāti. Anupādāparinibbānaṁ anto pariyosānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:19_17: Payojetīti ‘‘payojanaṁ’’. Payojetīti niyojeti. Kiṁ niyojeti. Phalatthikaṁjanaṁ. Kattha
anya-e0401n0:19_18: niyojeti. Phalanibbattakekamme. Kimatthāya niyojeti. Tassakammassa karaṇatthāyāti.
anya-e0401n0:19_21: phalaṁpidīpeti. Phalavacanaṁ kāraṇaṁpidīpeti. Yathātaṁ asukasmiṁ raṭṭhe sammādevo
anya-e0401n0:19_22: vuṭṭhoti vutte taṁ raṭṭhaṁsu bhikkhanti viññāyati. Asukaraṭṭhaṁ subhikkhantivutte
anya-e0401n0:19_23: tasmiṁ raṭṭhe sammādevo vuṭṭhoti viññāyatīti. Payojanaṁ pana abhidhammattha saddena
anya-e0401n0:19_24: dassetabbaṁ natthi, saṅgahavacanasāmatthiyeneva siddhaṁ hotīti adhippāyena ‘‘saṅgahasaddenā’’ti
anya-e0401n0:19_25: vuttaṁ. Sāmatthiyadassane pana suṭṭhu paripuṇṇavacanaṁ icchitabbaṁ hoti. Itarathā
anya-e0401n0:19_26: aniṭṭhatthappasaṅgopi siyāti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘taṁ na sundara’’nti vatvā ‘‘nahī’’tiādinā
anya-e0401n0:20_0: 2. Evaṁ sappayojane pañcapiṇḍattheti ettha pañcapiṇḍatthe dassetvā idāni tesaṁpañcannaṁ
anya-e0401n0:20_3: attho. Napametabbanti appameyyaṁ. Pametuṁ asakkuṇeyyanti attho. Evaṁ kiccapaccayānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:20_4: katthaci sakkattha dīpanaṁ hoti. Sakavacanaṁ pāḷivacanena sādhetuṁ ‘‘yathāhā’’ti
anya-e0401n0:20_5: pucchitvā pāḷigāthaṁ āhari. Tattha ‘‘yathāhā’’ti kathaṁ āha iccevattho. Anantare
anya-e0401n0:20_6: vuttassa atthassa sādhakaṁ vacanaṁ kathaṁ pāḷiyaṁ āha, kathaṁ aṭṭhakathāyaṁ āha,
anya-e0401n0:20_7: kathaṁ ṭīkāyaṁ āhāti evaṁ yathārahaṁ attho veditabbo. ‘‘Tetādisenibbute akutobhaye
anya-e0401n0:20_8: pūjayato’’ti yojanā. Tattha ‘‘te’’ti buddha buddha sāvake. ‘‘Tādise’’ti tathā rūpesī
anya-e0401n0:20_9: lakkhandhādiguṇa sampanne. ‘‘Nibbute’’ti kilesa nibbānena nibbute. Natthi kutoci
anya-e0401n0:20_10: hetuto bhayaṁ yesaṁ te akuto bhayā. Anāgāmi khīṇāsavā. ‘‘Bhaya’’nti cittutrāsabhayaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:20_12: ‘‘Saṅgahakārā’’ti buddhaghosattherādayo pacchima aṭṭhakathākārā vuccanti. Tehi porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0401n0:20_14: karonti. Tasmā sabbāabhinavaaṭṭhakathāyo saṅgahā nāma honti. Te ca ācariyā saṅgahakārā
anya-e0401n0:20_15: nāma. Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘saṅgahakārāti buddhaghosa. Pe… vuccantī’’ti. Te antarāya nīvāraṇameva
anya-e0401n0:20_16: icchantīti kathaṁ viññāyatīti ce. Tesaṁ vacanena viññāyatīti dassetuṁ saṅgahakāra
anya-e0401n0:20_17: gāthaṁ āhari. ‘‘Ratanattayekatassa etassanipaccakārassa ānubhāvena antarāye asesatososetvāti
anya-e0401n0:21_0: 3. ‘‘Kathañcahotī’’ti sambandho. Iti ayaṁ pucchā. ‘‘Vuccate’’ti visajjanā kathīyate.
anya-e0401n0:21_2: ‘‘Aneka…pe… vāre’’ti accanta saṁyogatthe upayoga vacanaṁ. ‘‘Puññābhisando’’ti puññābhisoto,
anya-e0401n0:21_3: puññappavāhoti tasseva vevacanaṁ. ‘‘So ca puññātissayo hotī’’ti sambandho. Kasmā
anya-e0401n0:21_4: so puññā tissayo hotīti. Khetta sampattiyā ca ajjhāsaya sampattiyā ca hotīti dassetuṁ
anya-e0401n0:21_7: Puññābhisandoyeva. Paribhāvitassa bhāvo paribhāvitattaṁ. Ubhayatthāpi hetu atthe
anya-e0401n0:21_9: ‘‘Mahānisaṁso’’ti ānisaṁsapphalena mahānisaṁso. Ānisaṁsapphalanti ca paramparā phalaṁ
anya-e0401n0:21_10: vuccati. Aññaṁ puññaṁ atikkamanto sayati pavattatīti atissayo. Puññañca taṁ atissayocāti
anya-e0401n0:21_11: puññātissayo. Atissayapuññaṁ, adhika puññanti attho. ‘‘So anubalaṁ deti, okāsalābhaṁ
anya-e0401n0:21_12: karotī’’ti sambandho. Kathañca anubalaṁ deti, kathañca okāsalābhaṁ karotīti āha ‘‘sayaṁ
anya-e0401n0:21_13: payoga sampattibhāveṭhatvā’’tiādiṁ. Tattha payogasampattināma atīta puññakammānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:21_16: āgatā dukkhuppattipaccayā. Sampattipaccayānāma kāyacittānaṁ sappāya paccayā. Cattāro
anya-e0401n0:21_17: paccayā ca upaṭṭhākakulāni ca ārakkha devatādayo ca sukhuppatti paccayā. Tehi paccayehi
anya-e0401n0:21_18: pāmojja bahu lassa therassa santāne rattidivaṁ pītipassaddhisukhasamādhīnaṁ pavattiyā
anya-e0401n0:21_19: ajjhattabhūtā utucittāhārā ca ati paṇītā honti. Tehi samuṭṭhitā sarīraṭṭhakadhātuyo
anya-e0401n0:21_20: ca atipaṇītā eva hutvā upabrūhanti. Tattha sarīraṭṭhakadhātuyo nāma pathavi ādayo
anya-e0401n0:21_22: pavattivipākajanakassa bahuvidhassa puñña kammassa. ‘‘Athā’’ti tasmiṁ kāleti attho.
anya-e0401n0:21_23: ‘‘Balavabalavantiyo hutvā’’ti pakati balato atibalavantiyo hutvā. ‘‘Tasmiṁ therasantāne’’ti
anya-e0401n0:21_25: pūrite. ‘‘Okāso nāma natthī’’ti patiṭṭhānokāso nāma natthi. ‘‘Itī’’ti tasmā. ‘‘Dūrato
anya-e0401n0:21_26: apanītāneva hontī’’ti sambandho. Iṭṭhapphalasantānaṁ vibādhanti nīvārentīti iṭṭhapphalasantānavibādhakāni
anya-e0401n0:21_27: upapīḷakūpaghātakakammāni. Aniṭṭhapphala santāna janakāni, akusala janaka kammāni,
anya-e0401n0:21_28: apuñña kammānīti tānitividhāni akusalakammāni dūrato apanītāneva honti, tesaṁ vipākassa
anya-e0401n0:21_29: anokāsakaraṇenāti adhippāyo. Tenāha ‘‘nahī’’tiādiṁ. ‘‘Tato’’ti tasmā apuñña kammānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:21_30: dūrato apanītattā. Abhivādetabbānaṁ mātāpitu samaṇabrāhmaṇādīnaṁ abhivādanakammegaruṁkaraṇaṁ
anya-e0401n0:21_31: abhivādana sīlaṁ nāma. Taṁ assa atthīti abhivādanasīlī. Guṇavuddhavayavuddhe apaceti
anya-e0401n0:21_32: attānaṁ nīcavutti karaṇena pūjetisīlenāti vuddhāpacāyī. Ubhayatthāpisampadāna vacanaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:21_33: Evantiādini gamana vacanaṁ. Nigamanti ca niṭṭhaṅgamanaṁ. Tasmātiādi laddhaguṇa vacanaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:21_34: Laddhaguṇoti ca taṁtaṁpasaṅga visodhanaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ katvā laddhovisuddho attho vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:21_35: Tathā vacana sāmatthiyena laddho atthantaropi ayamidha adhippeto. ‘‘Nakevalañca therasseva
anya-e0401n0:21_36: anantarāyena parisamāpanatthaṁ hotī’’ti yojanā. ‘‘Sotūnañcagahaṇa kicca sampajjanattha’’ntisambandho.
anya-e0401n0:21_38: tanattayevandanā puññassasiddhito. Javanavinicchaye yasmā antarāya nīvāraṇaṁnāma
anya-e0401n0:21_39: diṭṭhadhamme icchitabbaṁ phalaṁ hoti. Diṭṭha dhammo ca pathama javanassa vipākakkhettaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:21_40: Tasmā upatthambhana kiccaṁ patvāpi pathama javana cetanā eva idhapariyattāti adhippāyena
anya-e0401n0:21_41: ‘‘diṭṭhadhammavedanīyabhūtā’’ti vuttaṁ. Sā pana pathama javana cetanā upatthambhana
anya-e0401n0:21_42: kiccaṁ patvāpi sabbadubbalā evasiyā. Kasmā, aladdhāsevanattā. Sesa cetanāyo eva balavatiyo
anya-e0401n0:21_43: siyuṁ. Kasmā, laddhā sevanattāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. ‘‘Sattajavanapakkhe adhippetattā upaladdhabbattā
anya-e0401n0:21_45: hoti. Evamevaṁ appamattakaṁ hotī’’ti yojetabbaṁ. ‘‘Tathāhī’’ti tato evāti attho.
anya-e0401n0:21_47: ‘kabaḷīkāro āhāro āhārasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo’ti vibhatto siyāti.
anya-e0401n0:21_48: ‘‘Adhunāvā’’ti imasmiṁ bhave eva. Evaṁ vandanāyapayojanaṁ dīpetvā idāni sesānaṁ piṇḍatthānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:21_50: abhidhammattha saṅgaha-nti padaṁ sutvā viññātesati, ‘‘ussāhojāyati’’. Imaṁ uggahetvā
anya-e0401n0:21_51: sudullabhe abhidhammatthe ca anāyāsena jānissāma, tammūlakassa ca anupādā parinibbānantassa
anya-e0401n0:23_0: 4. Padatthe. ‘‘Bujjhī’’ti aññāsi. ‘‘Etthā’’ti etasmiṁ pade. Ca saddo vākyārambha
anya-e0401n0:23_1: jotako. Vākyā rambhoti ca mūlavākye yaṁ yaṁ vattabbaṁ avuttaṁ, tassa tassa kathanatthāya
anya-e0401n0:23_3: sammāsaddo asesa byāpanaṁ dīpetīti pucchāya purimatthame vabyatirekato ca anvayato
anya-e0401n0:23_4: ca puna vitthārento ‘‘tathāhī’’tiādimāha. Tattha, ‘‘tathāhī’’ti tassa vacanassa ayaṁ
anya-e0401n0:23_5: vitthāroti joteti. ‘‘Aviparīta’’nti kiriyāvisesana padametaṁ. ‘‘Attano visaye evā’’ti
anya-e0401n0:23_6: attano ñāṇavisaye eva tesaṁ visayocāti sambandho. Yasmā ekopi dhammo kāladesasantānādibhedena
anya-e0401n0:23_7: ananta bhedo hoti. Tasmā padesañāṇikā paccekabuddhādayo ekadhammaṁpi sabbākārato
anya-e0401n0:23_8: jānituṁ na sakkonti. Tenāha ‘‘tehī’’tiādiṁ. Tattha ‘‘sabbākārato’’ti sabhāvato, hetuto,
anya-e0401n0:23_9: paccayato, phalato, nissandato, kālato, desatotiādinā ākārena. ‘‘Yatthā’’ti yasmiṁ
anya-e0401n0:23_10: avisayedhamme. ‘‘Te viparītaṁ bujjheyyuṁ, so avisayo nāmadhammonatthī’’tiyojanā.
anya-e0401n0:23_11: Taṁ vitthārento ‘‘tehī’’tiādimāha. Tattha, ‘‘tiyaddhagate’’ti tīsukālesu gate pavatte.
anya-e0401n0:23_13: ‘‘Sabbe dhammā’’tiādi pāḷisādhakaṁ. Tattha, ‘‘āpāta’’nti abhimukhaṁ patanaṁ. Ābādhantipi
anya-e0401n0:23_15: pacchimabhave paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya pavattaṁ aṭṭhasu mahāvipākesu pathamamahāvipākaṁ
anya-e0401n0:23_17: sabbakālaṁ upaṭṭhānākāra pattā hutvā tiṭṭhanti. Kasmā, kassaci āvaraṇassa abhāvato.
anya-e0401n0:23_18: Idaṁpihi ekaṁ upaṭṭhānaṁ nāmāti. ‘‘Āvajjanāyā’’ti manodvārāvajjana cittena. Dhammā
anya-e0401n0:23_19: mahantā. Bhavaṅgaṁ parittakaṁ. Tasmā parittakaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ ekakkhaṇe mahantānaṁ dhammānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:23_20: napahotīti codakassa adhippāyo. ‘‘Nacodetabbameta’’nti etaṁ ṭhānaṁ nacodetabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:24_0: Evaṁ sammāsaddassa atthaṁ vicāretvā idāni saṁsaddassa atthaṁ vicārento ‘‘saṁsaddopanā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:24_2: paṭivijjhanaññāṇesu. Natthi ācariyo etassāti anācariyo. Samāsante kakārena saha anācariyako.
anya-e0401n0:24_3: Anācariyakassa bhāvo anācariyakatā. Taṁ anācariyakataṁ. Tatīyā ruppasamāpatti nāma
anya-e0401n0:24_4: ākiñcaññāyatanajjhānaṁ. Taṁ bhagavā āḷārassa santike uggaṇhāti. Catutthāruppasamāpatti
anya-e0401n0:24_5: nāma nevasaññā nāsaññāyatanajjhānaṁ. Taṁ udakassasantike uggaṇhātīti vuttaṁ ‘‘āḷārudakamūlikā’’ti.
anya-e0401n0:24_7: hoti. ‘‘Chaḍḍitattā’’ti etāsamāpattiyonālaṁ bodhāya, atha kho yāvadeva tatīya catutthāruppabhavappaṭilābhāya
anya-e0401n0:24_8: saṁvattantīti evaṁ ādīnavaṁ disvā chaḍḍitattā. ‘‘Bujjhanakiriyāyā’’ti paṭivedhaññāṇassa.
anya-e0401n0:24_9: ‘‘Kuto paṭivedhadhammā’’ti tā kuto paṭivedhadhammā honti. Paṭivedhadhammā eva ca
anya-e0401n0:25_0: Pāḷiyaṁ. ‘‘Pubbe ananussutesudhammesū’’ti imasmiṁ bhave ito pubbe kassacisantike
anya-e0401n0:25_2: vuttaṁ. Tadeva ñāṇaṁ sabbaññutaññāṇassa padaṭṭhānaṁ hoti. Tappaccayā tadanantarā
anya-e0401n0:25_3: evasabbaññutaññāṇaṁ pātubbhavatīti vuttaṁ ‘‘tattha ca sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇātī’’ti. ‘‘Tadanantarā’’ti
anya-e0401n0:25_4: ca arahatta maggavīthiyāca catunnaṁ paccavekkhana vārānañca anantare kāleti attho.
anya-e0401n0:25_6: Tāsu hi paccattavacanaṁ, upayogavacanaṁ, karaṇa vacanaṁ, sampadāna vacanaṁ, nissakkavacanaṁ,
anya-e0401n0:25_7: sāmivacanaṁ, summavacananti evaṁ anukkamena sattannaṁ vibhattīnaṁ nāmāni āgatānīti.
anya-e0401n0:26_1: ettha attano vasaṁ vattetuṁ samatthatā saṅkhātosatti viseso vasonāma. Vaso etassa
anya-e0401n0:26_2: atthīti vasī-vasigaṇehītiādīsuviya. Vasino bhāvo vasibhāvo. Taṁ vasibhāvanti attho.
anya-e0401n0:28_1: iti tasmā dutīyena atulapadena kiṁ payojanaṁ atthīti attho. ‘‘Nana samatthā’’ti nasamatthā
anya-e0401n0:28_2: na hotīti yojanā. Samatthā evāti adhippāyo. ‘‘Mattakārino’’ti pamāṇakārino. ‘‘Thero
anya-e0401n0:28_3: ca tesaṁ aññataro’’, tasmā mattaṁ na karoti, dutīyaṁ atula padaṁ āharīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:28_4: ‘‘Apicā’’ti kiñci vattabbaṁ atthīti attho. ‘‘Nakevalaṁ vandanāya antarāyanīvāraṇameva
anya-e0401n0:28_5: icchi tabbaṁ hotī’’ti yojanā. ‘‘Vandanāyā’’ti vandanāhetu. Sopi paññāpāṭavādi attho.
anya-e0401n0:28_6: ‘‘Ganthapārisuddhiyā’’ti ganthadosānāma padadosa vākyadosa atthadosādayo atthi. Tehi
anya-e0401n0:28_7: dosehi imassa ganthassa pārisuddhiyā. Kathaṁ pana vandanāya paññāpāṭavādi atthosambhavatīti
anya-e0401n0:28_8: vuttaṁ ‘‘anussatiṭṭhānesū’’tiādi. Anussatiṭṭhānāni nāma buddha dhamma saṅghasīlādīni.
anya-e0401n0:28_10: attha byañjana padesu amandā vissaṭṭhā hutvā vahati. ‘‘Tadatthāyapī’’ti paññāpāṭavādi
anya-e0401n0:28_11: atthāyapi. Guṇanāmapadānaṁ guṇatthonāmaviggaha vākyesu pākaṭo, siddhapadesu apākaṭo.
anya-e0401n0:28_12: Tasmā tāni viggahatthaṁ ajānantānaṁ santike nāma mattāni sampajjantīti vuttaṁ ‘‘yathāvutta
anya-e0401n0:28_14: jānantānaṁ. Māgadhabhāsāhi mūlabhāsāti ca ariyabhāsāti ca māgadhabhāsāti ca pāḷibhāsāti
anya-e0401n0:28_15: ca dhammaniruttīti ca sabhāvaniruttīti ca vuccati. ‘‘Bhāvatthasuñña’’nti ettha guṇanāmānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:28_16: guṇattho bhāvattho nāma. So evasakatthoti ca vacanatthoti ca viggahatthoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:28_18: bhavituṁ nārahati. Tathāhi anāthapiṇḍikoseṭṭhi rājagahaṁ anupatto buddho loke uppannoti
anya-e0401n0:28_19: sutvā udānaṁ udānesi=ghosopi kho esodullabho lokasmiṁ yadidaṁ buddho=ti. Tasmā buddhoti
anya-e0401n0:28_20: nāmaṁpi loke mahantaṁ sudullabhaṁguṇapadaṁ hoti. Sammāsambuddha nāmevattabbamevanatthīti.
anya-e0401n0:28_21: ‘‘Sabhāvaniruttiṁ ajānantānaṁ pana padasahassaṁ vuccamānaṁpī’’ti tiṭṭhatu ekaṁ atulapadaṁ,
anya-e0401n0:28_22: padasahassaṁpi vuccamānaṁ satthusamaññāmattameva sampajjati. Tādisāhi janā idaṁ loke
anya-e0401n0:29_0: ‘‘Atulo’’ti aññena so asadisoti vā, añño vātena sadisotassanatthītivā, - dvidhāpiattholabbhati.
anya-e0401n0:29_1: Sādhakagāthāyaṁ ‘‘paṭipuggalo’’ti yugaggāhīpuggalo. Kiñcāpi makkhali pūraṇādayo visuṁvisuṁ
anya-e0401n0:29_2: - ahaṁ sabbaññū sabbadassāvī - tica, ahaṁ sammāsambuddho-tica paṭijānantā yugaggāhino
anya-e0401n0:29_3: hutvā vicaranti. Dhammato pana sineru pabbata rājassa santike sakkhara kathalāniviyasampajjantīti.
anya-e0401n0:29_5: bhūtassapattassa. ‘‘Yaṁ buddha bhūtassa atulattaṁ, etaṁ anacchariya’’nti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:29_6: Yadi cetaṁ anacchariyaṁ hoti, katamaṁ pana tāva acchariyaṁ bhavatīti āha ‘‘sampatijātassā’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:29_7: Tattha ‘‘sampatijātassā’’ti ajjevajātassapi assa bhagavato. Kathaṁ atulatā paññāyatīti
anya-e0401n0:29_9: atimahanto obhāso pātubbhavati. = Uḷāro obhāso pāturahosi atikkammadevānaṁ devānubhāva=ntihi
anya-e0401n0:29_10: vuttaṁ. Tena obhāsena pharitā sabbe pathavi pabbatādayo jātiphalikakkhandhāviya suppasannā
anya-e0401n0:29_11: honti. Dasasahassa cakkavāḷāni ekatalaṁ hutvā paññāyanti. Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘anekāni cakkavāḷasahassāni
anya-e0401n0:29_13: sabba sattalokato. Evaṁ acchambhi vācaṁ nicchāresi dhammatāya sañcoditattāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:29_14: Tattha ‘‘acchambhivāca’’nti visāradavācaṁ. Āsabhiṁ vācantipi pāṭho. Uttamavācanti
anya-e0401n0:29_15: attho. ‘‘Nicchāresī’’ti udāharati. Idampi anacchariyaṁ, aññaṁ pitato acchariyataraṁ
anya-e0401n0:29_16: atthīti dassetuṁ ‘‘yadāpanā’’tiādi āraddhaṁ. Pāramitā guṇehi tena sadiso kocinattheva
anya-e0401n0:29_17: thapetvā aññe ca mahābodhi satteti adhippāyo . ‘‘Assā’’ti tena sadisassa. ‘‘Natthibhāvo
anya-e0401n0:29_19: satasahassaṁ sakkhissatī’’ti yojanā. Pāramiyo pakārenavicinanti etenāti pāramipavicayo.
anya-e0401n0:29_20: Ñāṇaṁ. Taṁpanañāṇaṁ mahābodhisattānaṁ eva uppannaṁ nahoti. Paccekabodhisatta sāvakabodhisattānaṁpi
anya-e0401n0:29_21: uppannameva. Tadeva ca sabbesaṁpi bodhisattānaṁ niyatabyākaraṇappaṭilābhe padhānakāraṇanti
anya-e0401n0:29_23: nāmaṁ. Bodhimhisajanti laggantīti bodhisattā. ‘‘Laggantī’’ti tappaṭilābhatthāya niyata
anya-e0401n0:29_24: cittā hontīti attho. Bodhi atthāya paṭipannā sattā bodhisattātipi yujjati. Buddha
anya-e0401n0:29_25: suññepiloke kammassakatāñāṇe ṭhatvā vaṭṭadukkhato mokkhadhammapariyesino sattāti
anya-e0401n0:29_26: vuttaṁ hoti. ‘‘Sambhāra dhamme’’ti dasavidhe pārami dhamme. Vaṭṭaṁ anusaranti anugacchantīti
anya-e0401n0:29_27: vaṭṭānusārino. Pathaviyaṁ paṁsucuṇṇāni viya pakatiyā vaputhubhūtājanāti puthujjanā.
anya-e0401n0:29_28: Mahantāputhujjanāti mahāputhujjanā. Vaṭṭānusārino ca te mahāputhujjanācāti samāso.
anya-e0401n0:29_29: Tesaṁ bhāvoti viggaho. Ayaṁ bhāvoyeva tesaṁ bhūmīti ca vuccati. Atthato pana mokkhadhammanirapekkhatā
anya-e0401n0:29_30: eva. Acchandikatātipi vuccati. ‘‘Okkantā’’ti paviṭṭhā. Tayoniyatā, bodhisattaniyato
anya-e0401n0:29_31: ca cūḷasotāpannaniyato ca ariya sotāpannaniyato ca. Tattha bodhisattaniyato bodhisambhārabalena
anya-e0401n0:29_32: siddho. Cūḷasotāpanna niyato paccayākārānubodhaññāṇabalena. Ariyasotāpanna niyato
anya-e0401n0:29_33: sotāpatti maggaññāṇa balena. Tesu bodhisattaniyato idha adhippetoti vuttaṁ ‘‘ekena
anya-e0401n0:29_34: pariyāyenā’’tiādi. Vattabbamevanatthitesaṁ dvinnaṁ bodhisattānaṁ pārami pavicayaññāṇa
anya-e0401n0:29_35: sampattiyā vinā niyatabyākaraṇa lābhā saṅkāya eva abhāvatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:30_0: Padasiddhivicāreyaṁ vuttaṁ vibhāvaniyaṁ=tulāyasamitotulyo. Tulyo eva tuloyakāra lopavasenā=ti.
anya-e0401n0:30_3: Tattha ‘‘tulāyā’’ti loke dhāraṇatulāsadisāya paññāyāti attho. ‘‘Samīto’’ti samaṁ
anya-e0401n0:30_4: kato. Nahi tulasaddo bhavituṁ nayutto. Yutto evāti adhippāyo. Kathaṁ viññāyatīti
anya-e0401n0:30_6: ‘‘Kammasādhanenevā’’ti pubbe-tulayitabbo aññena saha pamitabboti tuloti evaṁ idhavuttena
anya-e0401n0:30_7: kamma sādhana vacanattheneva. ‘‘Tadatthasiddhito’’ti tassa vibhāvaniyaṁ vuttassa
anya-e0401n0:30_8: duvidhassa atthassa siddhito. ‘‘Tato’’ti tulasaddato. Cintāya kiṁ payojanaṁ atthi.
anya-e0401n0:30_9: Natthiyevāti adhippāyo. Vadati sīlenāti vattā. Vādī puggalo. Vattuno icchāvatticchā.
anya-e0401n0:30_10: Vattuṁ icchāvatticchātipivadanti. Vatticchaṁ anugato sammuti saṅketavohāra siddhattāti
anya-e0401n0:30_12: ‘‘Yathāsuta’’nti tula iti sutaṁ. ‘‘Yutta’’nti yathāsuta niyāmeneva yuttaṁ vajjetvā.
anya-e0401n0:30_14: ca assutassa. Itthiliṅgesati, tatopi eko akāroti katvā samītatthe dutīyo taddhita
anya-e0401n0:31_0: 6. Evaṁ dvinnaṁ padānaṁ padattha saṁvaṇṇanaṁ katvā idāni tesaṁyeva atthuddhārasaṁvaṇṇanaṁ
anya-e0401n0:31_2: nāma’’ samatiṁ sapāramīnaṁ paripūraṇaṁ. ‘‘Mahāvajiraññāṇa’’nti bhagavato āsavakkhayaññāṇampi
anya-e0401n0:31_3: vuccati. Tassa pubbabhāge buddhabhāvatthāya anupadadhammavipassanāvasena chattiṁsa
anya-e0401n0:31_4: koṭi satasahassa saṅkhānaṁ devasikaṁ vaḷañjanakapphalasamāpattīnaṁ pubbabhāga vipassanāñāṇampi
anya-e0401n0:31_5: mahāvajiraññāṇanti vuccati. Sabbampetaṁ mahāṭīkāyaṁ vuttaṁ. ‘‘Mahābodhiyā’’ti sabbaññu
anya-e0401n0:31_6: buddhānaṁ abhisambodhi saṅkhātassa aggamaggaññāṇassa. Pahiyyanti pahātabbā dhammā
anya-e0401n0:31_7: etenāti pahānaṁ. Pajahanti pahātabbedhammeetenātivā pahānanti katvā taṁ aggamaggaññāṇampitaṁ
anya-e0401n0:31_8: vipassanāñāṇampi pahānanti vuccatīti iminā adhippāyena ‘‘pahānasampadāyaṁ vā sā saṅgahitā’’ti
anya-e0401n0:31_9: vuttaṁ. Pañcasīlāni. Pāṇātipātassa pahānaṁsīlaṁ, veramaṇisīlaṁ, cetasikaṁsīlaṁ, saṁvarosīlaṁ,
anya-e0401n0:31_10: avītikkamosilantiādīsuviya etthahi pahānasīlaṁ nāma yathā vuttena atthena veramaṇisīlamevāti
anya-e0401n0:31_11: yujjati. Pahānaṁ nāma kocidhammo nahotīti adhippāye pana satipahāna sīsena pahānasādhakaṁ
anya-e0401n0:31_12: tadevañāṇadvayaṁ upacārenapahānanti gahetabbaṁ. Itarathā pahānasampadā nāma asārā
anya-e0401n0:31_13: aphalāti āpajjeyyāti. Paccekabuddha buddhasāvakā kilese pajahantāpi vāsanāya saha
anya-e0401n0:31_14: appajahanato citta santāne mohavāsanāya vijjamānattā sabbaññu bhāvaṁ nagacchanti.
anya-e0401n0:31_15: Tasmā yathātesaṁ kilesappahānaṁ pahānasampadā nāma nahoti. Natathāsabbaññubuddhānanti
anya-e0401n0:31_16: āha ‘‘sahavāsanāyā’’tiādiṁ. Vibhāvaniyaṁñāṇasampadā pathamaṁ vuttā. Tato pahāna sampadā.
anya-e0401n0:31_17: Ṭīkāyaṁ pana pahānasampadā pathamaṁ vuttā. Tato adhigama sampadānāma vuttā. Tato
anya-e0401n0:31_18: ñāṇasampadā. Pahānasampadāyañca aggamaggaññāṇaṁ dassitaṁ. Adhigama sampadāti ca sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭilābho
anya-e0401n0:31_21: sabbaññutaññāṇassapadaṭṭhānaṁ, āsanna kāraṇaṁ. ‘‘Na hi maggaññāṇato aññā pahānasampadānāma
anya-e0401n0:31_22: atthi’’. Paramatthato natthīti adhippāyo. Idañca visuddhimagge=pahānanti koci dhammonāma
anya-e0401n0:31_23: natthi aññatra vuttappakārānaṁ pāṇātipātādīnaṁ anuppādamattato=ti āgatattā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:31_24: Pahāyakadhammasamādānena pana pahātabba dhammānaṁ anuppādo nāma ekopaṇīta dhammohoti.
anya-e0401n0:31_25: Ekaṁ santi padaṁ hoti. Tathāhi vuttaṁ paṭisambhidā magge=uppādo bhayaṁ , anuppādo
anya-e0401n0:31_26: khemanti santipade ñāṇaṁ. Pavatti bhayaṁ, appavatti khemanti santipadeñāṇa=nti. Tadaṅgappahānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:31_27: panatadaṅgaanuppādo nāma. Vikkhambhanappahānaṁ vikkhambhana anuppādo nāma. Samucchedappahānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:31_28: samuccheda anuppādo nāmāti vattabbaṁ. Idha pana anuppāda sampāpakaṁ vipassanā ñāṇañca
anya-e0401n0:31_29: maggaññāṇañca upacārena pahānanti adhippetaṁ. Kasmā, upariñāṇa sampadādīnaṁ paccayattāti
anya-e0401n0:31_31: yuttito āgataṁ. ‘‘Sīlādiguṇehī’’ti sīla samādhi paññā vimutti vimuttiññāṇadassana
anya-e0401n0:31_33: dvattiṁsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi ca asīti khuddakalakkhaṇehi ca paṭimaṇḍitassa. ‘‘Āsayo’’ti
anya-e0401n0:31_37: dvepahāna sampadā ñāṇasampadā. Sammāsambuddhapade. ‘‘Sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhī’’ti
anya-e0401n0:31_38: ettha abhisambodhisaṅkhātaṁ aggamaggaññāṇaṁ gahitaṁ. Tañca pahānakiccappadhānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:31_39: ‘‘Tattha ca sabbaññutaṁ patto’’ti ettha sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ. ‘‘Balesu ca vasibhāva’’nti
anya-e0401n0:31_40: ettha dasabalaññāṇāni gahitāni. Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘dve…pe… sammāsambuddhapadenavibhāvitā’’ti.
anya-e0401n0:33_1: samavāyatthattā ahaṁlokanāyakañca saṅghañca namassissanti evaṁ samavāyattho viññāyati.
anya-e0401n0:33_2: Tathā idhapi sammāsambuddhañcasaddhammañca gaṇuttamañca abhivādiyāmīti evaṁ kiriyāsamavāyattho
anya-e0401n0:33_3: sahasaddena dīpitoti dassetuṁ ‘‘dūratohaṁ…pe… evamidaṁ daṭṭhabba’’nti vuttaṁ. ‘‘Ida’’nti
anya-e0401n0:33_4: sasaddhammagaṇuttamapadaṁ. Ettha ca‘‘samavāyo’’ti dvinnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ bahūnaṁ vā atthānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:33_5: ekasmiṁ dabbevā guṇevākiriyāyavāsamaṁ avecca ayanaṁpavattanaṁ samavāyo. Paccānutāpa
anya-e0401n0:33_6: paccānumodanādiṭhānesu=ahaṁ pubbedānaṁ nadadissaṁ, sīlaṁ narakkhissaṁ. - Anekajāti
anya-e0401n0:33_7: saṁsāraṁ sandhāvissa=ntiādinā atītepikāle anāgatavacanaṁ payujjatīti āha ‘‘namassissa’’nti
anya-e0401n0:33_9: Abbhūta tabbhāvecāyaṁ īkāro. Yathā, kāko setī bhavati, bako kaṇhībhavatīti. Ettha
anya-e0401n0:33_10: ca ‘‘setī bhavatī’’ti asetapubbo setobhavati. ‘‘Kaṇhībhavatī’’ti akaṇhapubbo kaṇhobhavatīti
anya-e0401n0:33_11: attho. Tathā idhapi. Buddhaṁ dhammañca saṅghañcavanditvā-tiādīsu visuṁvisuṁ padhānattā
anya-e0401n0:33_12: aguṇabhūtāpi dhammasaṅghā idhasamāsapade aññapadatthassaguṇabhūtāhonti. Ayaṁ abbhūtatabbhāvattho
anya-e0401n0:33_13: nāma. ‘‘Abhivāditabhāvo’’ti vutte tapaccayassa bahulaṁ atītakālavisayattā pubbeganthārambhakāle
anya-e0401n0:33_14: dhamma saṅghānaṁpi therassa vandanāsiddhi dassitā hoti. ‘‘Abhivādetabba bhāvo’’ti
anya-e0401n0:33_15: vuttepana tabbapaccayassakālasāmaññavisayattāna tathā dassitā hoti. Dānaṁ dātabbaṁ,
anya-e0401n0:33_16: sīlaṁ rakkhitabbantiādīsu viya dhammasaṅghānāmasabbakālaṁpi abhivādetabbāti. Evaṁ
anya-e0401n0:33_17: dhammasaṅghānaṁ sabbakālaṁpi abhivādanārahaguṇo eva dassitoti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ
anya-e0401n0:33_19: Kālavisesaṁ pana nadīpetiyeva. ‘‘Attano nidassanenā’’ti saputtadāro āgatoti attanā
anya-e0401n0:33_20: nīharitvā dassitena payogena. Sohi payogo kiriyā samavāyasseva. Naguṇasamavāyassāti.
anya-e0401n0:33_21: Ettha ca therassa vandanāvacane thero imehi yevapadehi ratanattayaṁtīhidvāre hivandatīti
anya-e0401n0:33_22: gahetvā ‘‘abhivādiyā’’ti ettha abhivādiyādhīti ca atthaṁ nīharanti. Appadhāna kiriyāpade
anya-e0401n0:33_23: pana tadattha nīharaṇaṁ asambhāvento ‘‘apicā’’tiādimāha. Tattha ‘‘apicā’’ti kiñci
anya-e0401n0:33_24: vattabbaṁ atthīti atthajotane ayaṁ nipātasamudayo. ‘‘Ganthappaṭiññāyā’’ti ganthappaṭiññāvacanena.
anya-e0401n0:34_0: Vacanatthe . Sadhano puriso, dhanavāpuriso-ti ādayo samāsataddhitasaddā yebhūyyena
anya-e0401n0:34_1: atissayattha dīpakā honti. Nahi appakena dhanena tathā voharanti. Tasmā idhāpi tathā
anya-e0401n0:34_2: rūpaṁ atissayatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘attanānimmitena…pe… saraṇabhūtenā’’ti vuttaṁ. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:34_5: sasaddhamma gaṇuttamanti thomanaṁ. ‘‘Idaṁpī’’ti dutīyattha sampiṇḍane ayaṁpikāro.
anya-e0401n0:34_6: Nakevalaṁ purimapadadvayameva satthu asādhāraṇaguṇapadaṁ hoti. Atha kho idaṁpi padaṁ
anya-e0401n0:35_2: ‘‘Nibbānañcanippariyāyato dhammo nāmā’’ti kasmā vuttaṁ, nanu nissaraṇappahānameva
anya-e0401n0:35_3: nibbānassa kiccaṁ, idañca samucchedappahānanti codanaṁ pariharanto ‘‘ariyamaggāhī’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:35_4: ‘‘Nibbānena saheva hutvā’’ti ārammaṇādhipatibhūtaṁ ārammaṇū panissayabhūtañca nibbānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:35_5: attano patiṭṭhaṁ katvāti adhippāyo. Apica, samucchedoti ca nissaraṇanti ca atthato
anya-e0401n0:35_6: samānagatikaṁ hoti. Tasmā nissaraṇaṁpi mukhyadhāraṇa mevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Nissaraṇamevavā
anya-e0401n0:35_9: samuccheda kicce asahāyattāti. Ettha ca ‘‘sāmaññapphalānī’’ti samaṇassa bhāvo sāmaññaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:35_10: Ariyamaggassetaṁ nāmaṁ. Sāmaññassaphalaṁ sāmaññapphalaṁ. Dutīyavikappe akicca paccayabhūtāpi
anya-e0401n0:35_11: kecikitakapaccayā kammatthegatā kiccapaccayānaṁpi atthaṁ dīpeti. Yathā, diṭṭhaṁ,
anya-e0401n0:35_12: sutaṁ, mutaṁ, viññātanti vuttaṁ ‘‘dhāraṇāraho’’ti. ‘‘Yathā vutta dhammā yevā’’ti
anya-e0401n0:35_14: nibbānameva. Bahuvacana sotepatitattā ettha bahuvacanaṁ ruḷaṁ. Puna ‘‘kecī’’ti cattāro
anya-e0401n0:35_15: sāmaññapphala dhammā. ‘‘Kecī’’ti pariyatti dhammo. Etthāpi bahuvacanaṁ sotapatitameva.
anya-e0401n0:35_16: ‘‘Dhārenta’’nti dhārentaṁ puggalaṁ. Tatīya vikappe ‘‘apatamānaṁ vahantī’’ti apatamānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:35_17: katvā vahanti. Catuttha vikappe ‘‘etthā’’ti etasmiṁ dhamme. Dhammovadīpaṁ etesanti
anya-e0401n0:35_18: dhammadīpā. Dhammova paṭisaraṇaṁ etesanti dhammappaṭisaraṇā. Dhammadīpā bhikkhave
anya-e0401n0:35_19: bhavatha dhammappaṭisaraṇā, anaññappaṭisaraṇā tihi vuttaṁ. Laddhā patiṭṭhā etesanti
anya-e0401n0:35_21: codakopaṭipatti dhammaṁ dasavidha dhammato aññaṁmaññamāno ‘‘kasmā’’tiādinā codeti.
anya-e0401n0:35_22: So pana paṭipatti dhammo tato aññona hoti, tattheva antogadhoti dassento ‘‘sopanā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:35_24: patiṭṭhā bhāvena pubbabhāga nissayo hoti. Kasmā, itoyevatassa pupphapphalassa jātattā
anya-e0401n0:35_25: etthevasaṁ vaḍḍhitattā ca. Tathā paṭipatti dhammopi ariyamaggapphalassapatiṭṭhābhāvena
anya-e0401n0:35_26: pubbabhāgūpanissayappaṭipadāhoti. Kasmā, itoyeva tassajātattā etthevasaṁ vaḍḍhitattā
anya-e0401n0:35_27: ca. Vuttañhetaṁ mahāvagga saṁyutte. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave yekeci mebījagāmabhūtagāmāvuḍḍhiṁ
anya-e0401n0:35_28: viruḷiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjanti. Sabbete pathaviṁ nissāya pathaviṁ patiṭṭhāya. Evameva
anya-e0401n0:35_29: kho bhikkhave bhikkhusīlaṁ nissāya sīlepatiṭṭhāya ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgīkaṁ maggaṁ bhāvento
anya-e0401n0:35_30: vuḍḍhiṁ viruḷhiṁ vepullaṁ pāpuṇāti dhammesūti. ‘‘Pubbacetanāviyadāne’’ti yathā tividhaṁ
anya-e0401n0:35_31: puññaṁ, dānamayaṁ puññaṁ sīlamayaṁ puññaṁ bhāvanāmayaṁ puññanti vutte dānavatthu
anya-e0401n0:35_32: pariyesanato paṭṭhāya dānaṁ ārabbhapavattā sabbā pubbabhāga cetanā dānavacane saṅgahitā
anya-e0401n0:35_33: dānantveva saṅkhyaṁgatā. Evaṁ so paṭipatti dhammo ariya maggavacane evasaṅgahito,
anya-e0401n0:35_34: ariyamaggo tveva saṅkhyaṁ gatoti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:36_0: Imasmiṁ dhammasaṁsandane aparampi vattabbaṁ vadanto ‘‘apicā’’tiādimāha. Tattha ‘‘yadaggenā’’ti
anya-e0401n0:36_1: yenakāraṇakoṭṭhāsena dhāraṇūpāyotiādinā kāraṇabhāgenāti attho. Vandanaṁ araha tīti
anya-e0401n0:36_2: vandaneyyo. Tasmiṁ vandaneyye. ‘‘Puthujjanakalyāṇako’’ti ettha tividho kalyāṇako
anya-e0401n0:36_3: vinayakalyāṇako suttantakalyāṇako abhidhammakalyāṇakoti. Tattha vinaye paññattāya
anya-e0401n0:36_4: kalyāṇappaṭipattiyā samannāgato bhikkhu vinayakalyāṇako nāma. So idha bhikkhu pātimokkha
anya-e0401n0:36_5: saṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāra gocara sampanno, aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya
anya-e0401n0:36_6: sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti ettha veditabbo. Tattha vinaye paññattākalyāṇappaṭipattiduvidhā,
anya-e0401n0:36_8: sīlaṁ ādibrahmacariyakaṁ nāma. Khandhakapariyāpannaṁ sīlaṁ abhisamacārikaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:37_0: Suttantesu vuttāya kalyāṇappaṭipattiyā samannāgato gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā suttanta
anya-e0401n0:37_1: kalyāṇako nāma. So catūhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sabbaṁ duggatibhayaṁ
anya-e0401n0:37_2: samatikkanto hoti. Katamehi catūhi. Idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena
anya-e0401n0:37_3: samannāgato hoti iti piso bhagavā…pe… satthādevamanussānaṁ, buddho, bhagavāti. Dhamme
anya-e0401n0:37_4: aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo…pe… paccattaṁ veditabbo
anya-e0401n0:37_5: viññūhīti. Saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho…pe…
anya-e0401n0:37_6: anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassāti. Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hotīti ettha veditabbo.
anya-e0401n0:37_7: Tattha buddhe aveccappasādo nāma arahaṁ, sammāsambuddho, tiādikānaṁ guṇapadānaṁ attha
anya-e0401n0:37_8: jānanaññāṇena yutto pasādo. Ariyehikāmīyanti icchīyantīti ariyakantāni. Suparisuddhassa
anya-e0401n0:37_9: ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlassetaṁ nāmaṁ. Cattārimāni bhikkhave sotāpattiyaṅgāni. Katamāni cattāri.
anya-e0401n0:37_10: Sappurisasaṁsevo, saddhammassavanaṁ, yoniso manasikāro, dhammānu dhammappaṭipattītiādīni
anya-e0401n0:38_0: Abhidhamme vā suttantesu vā vuttāya kalyāṇappaṭipattiyā samannāgatogahaṭṭho vā pabbajito
anya-e0401n0:38_1: vā abhidhammakalyāṇako nāma. So idha sutavā ariyasāvako ariyānaṁ dassāvī ariya dhammassakovido
anya-e0401n0:38_2: ariyadhammesu vinīto. So rūpaṁ attato na samanupassatīti ettha veditabbo. Tattha,
anya-e0401n0:38_3: ‘‘sutavā’’ti ettha khandhā, yatana, dhātu, paṭiccasamuppāda, satipaṭṭhānā, dīsu uggaha
anya-e0401n0:38_4: paripucchā vinicchayaññāṇa samannāgato gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā suta vā nāmāti aṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0401n0:38_5: vutto. So eva puthujjana kalyāṇakoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:40: Andho puthujjano eko, kalyāṇeko puthujjano. ti
anya-e0401n0:41_0: Ca vuttaṁ. Aṅguttare pana catukkanipāte katamo puggalo appassuto sutena upapanno
anya-e0401n0:41_1: hoti. Idhekacco dhammaṁ suṇāti ekāyapi cātuppadikāya gāthāya attha maññāya dhamma
anya-e0401n0:41_2: maññāya dhammā nu dhammappaṭipanno hoti. Ayaṁ appassutosutena upapannoti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:41_3: Sutavāti ca sutena upapannoti ca atthato ekanti. Puthujjana kalyāṇako saṅghe sekkhesusaṅgahito.
anya-e0401n0:41_4: Vuttaṁhetaṁ parivāre ke sikkhantīti. Puthujjana kalyāṇakena saddhiṁ satta ariyapuggalā
anya-e0401n0:41_5: sikkhanti. Arahā khīṇāsavo sikkhitasikkhoti. Dakkhiṇa vibhaṅgasutta aṭṭhakathāyaṁ
anya-e0401n0:41_6: pana. Ti saraṇa saraṇaṁ gato upāsakopi sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanne saṅgahitoti
anya-e0401n0:41_7: vuttaṁ. Tattha, sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannonāma sotāpatti maggaṭṭho ariyapuggalo.
anya-e0401n0:41_9: asaṅgahito’’ti saṅghaṁsaraṇaṁ gacchāmīti ca, suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅghoti
anya-e0401n0:41_10: ca, evarūpesu ṭhānesu āgate saṅgha vacane asaṅgahito. ‘‘Na hitaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchantassasaraṇagamanaṁ
anya-e0401n0:41_11: sampajjatī’’ti idaṁ saṅghaṁsaraṇaṁ gacchāmīti ettha saṅgha vacanetassapuggalassa
anya-e0401n0:41_12: asaṅgahita bhāvasādhanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Tenāha ‘‘taṁ paṭikkhittaṁ hotī’’ti. Sace pana
anya-e0401n0:41_13: sabbaṁ bhagavato sāvakasaṅghaṁ anuddhissatameva puggalaṁ saṅghaṁsaraṇaṁ gaccheyya
anya-e0401n0:41_14: āyasmantaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmīti. Saraṇa gamanaṁ na sampajjatiyeva. Atha sabbaṁ bhagavato
anya-e0401n0:41_15: sāvakasaṅghaṁ uddissa tassa santike saraṇaṁ gaccheyya saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmīti.
anya-e0401n0:41_16: Sampajjatiyeva . Idañca daharakāle sabbappathamaṁ saraṇagamanaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:41_17: Idañhi saraṇa gamanaṁ nāma sakiṁ gahetvā ratanattaye saddhaṁ ajahantassa yāvajīvaṁpi
anya-e0401n0:41_18: na bhijjati. Punappunaṁ gahaṇa kiccaṁ natthi. Punappunaṁ gaṇhantepi dosonatthi. Punappunaṁ
anya-e0401n0:41_19: puññaṁ vaḍḍhati. Sabbappathamaṁ gahaṇakāle ca aññena dinnattā laddhaṁ nahoti. Attanovacī
anya-e0401n0:41_20: bhedena laddhaṁ hoti. Tasmā aññassa santike aggahetvā sayameva vacībhedaṁ gaṇhantassa
anya-e0401n0:41_21: gahaṭṭhassa saraṇa gamanaṁ sampajjatiyeva. Tathā sabbāni gahaṭṭhasīlānīti. Sāmaṇera
anya-e0401n0:41_22: saraṇa gamanampana bhikkhunādinnameva labbhati. Tañca kho ubhinnaṁpiṭhānakaraṇa sampattiyā
anya-e0401n0:41_23: sati evāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. ‘‘Vo’’ti tumhākaṁ. Yodhammo ca desito yovinayocapaññatto.
anya-e0401n0:41_24: ‘‘Mamaccayenā’’ti mamātikkamena. Mayi parinibbuteti vuttaṁ hoti. Satthā bhavissatīti
anya-e0401n0:41_27: dussīlopāpadhammoti adhippāyo. Visesato pana vinayappaṭipatti eva idha pariyattāti
anya-e0401n0:41_28: daṭṭhabbā. ‘‘So’’ti sodussīlo pāpadhammo. Attanopi saraṇaṁ nahoti. Avassaṁ apāyagāmīyeva
anya-e0401n0:41_29: so hotīti adhippāyo. ‘‘Kuto saraṇaṁ bhavissatī’’ti yojanā. ‘‘Anekesu suttasahassesū’’ti
anya-e0401n0:41_30: vinayepi bahūni garahasuttapadāni dissanti suttantesupi. Visesato pana aggikkhandhopamasuttādīsu.
anya-e0401n0:42_0: Saddhammavacanatthe. Kilesesamenti vūpasamentīti santoti vacanatthaṁ sandhāya ‘‘samitakilesāna’’nti
anya-e0401n0:42_1: vuttaṁ. Santa saddo pana pasattheca, pūjiteca, sappuriseca, paṇḍiteca, dissatīti
anya-e0401n0:42_3: yojanā. Etena sabhāvato atthisaṁvijjatīti santoti dasseti. ‘‘So’’ti aññatitthiya
anya-e0401n0:42_5: sampajjati, yebhuyyena duggati vipākattāti adhippāyo. ‘‘Ayaṁ panā’’ti satthu saddhammo
anya-e0401n0:42_6: pana. ‘‘Tathā dhārentassā’’ti ayaṁ me hitoti dhārentassa hitoyevasampajjati, sugati
anya-e0401n0:43_1: janā gaṇīyanti etthāti gaṇo. Saṁhanīyanti ekatokarīyanti etthāti saṅghoti imamatthaṁ
anya-e0401n0:43_2: dīpeti. Saha ekato dhammaṁ carantīti sahadhammikā. Ekassa satthuno dhamma vinaye
anya-e0401n0:43_3: pabbajitā. Tesaṁ sahadhammikānaṁ. Bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho uttamagaṇo nāma. Ye keci
anya-e0401n0:43_4: loke saṅghāvā gaṇāvā. Tathāgatassa sāvakasaṅgho tesaṁ aggamakkhāyatīti hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:43_5: Soyeva idha gaṇuttamoti vuccati visesana para nipāta vasenāti adhippāyo. Uttamasaddassa
anya-e0401n0:43_7: saṅghoyeva vuccati’’ saṅghasaddassapi samūhaṭṭhe niruḷhattā, ‘‘so vinayakammesu pasiddho’’ti
anya-e0401n0:43_10: pasiddho pākaṭo. Dakkhiṇā vuccati kammañca kammaphalañca saddahitvā āyatiṁ vipākapphalappaṭi
anya-e0401n0:43_11: lābhatthāya dinnaṁ dānakammaṁ dakkhanti vaḍḍhanti sattā etāyāti katvā. Taṁdakkhiṇaṁ
anya-e0401n0:43_12: paṭiggaṇhituṁ arahatīti dakkhiṇeyyo. ‘‘Arahatī’’ti ca anuttara puññakkhetta visesattādāyakena
anya-e0401n0:43_13: icchita patthitassa āyatiṁ phalassa suṭṭhusampādanavasena dāyakassa ca avirādhanato
anya-e0401n0:43_14: asaṅkhyeyyāppameyyavaḍḍhi āvahanato ca paṭiggaṇhituṁ arahati. Evarūpaṁhidānaṁ nāma
anya-e0401n0:43_15: uḷāradānaṁ hoti. Taṁ yesudussīlesudiyyati. Tesaṁ khetta duṭṭhattā dāyakena icchitapatthitaṁ
anya-e0401n0:43_16: phalaṁ na sampādeti. Nipphalaṁ vā hoti. Appapphalaṁ vā. Evaṁsati, te dāyakañca virādhenti
anya-e0401n0:43_17: nāma. Puññapphalāni ca vināsenti nāma. Sayañca taṁdānaṁ paṭiggahaṇato vā paribhogato
anya-e0401n0:43_18: vā saddhādeyyaṁ vinipātanato vā duggati bhāgino honti. Tasmāte evarūpaṁ dānaṁ paṭiggaṇhituṁ
anya-e0401n0:43_19: nārahantīti. ‘‘Upasampadākammaṁ sammuti nāmā’’ti ekena pariyāyena sammuti kammaṁ
anya-e0401n0:43_20: nāma. Tañhi kāmaṁtera sasusammuti kammesunāgataṁ. Ñatti catuttha kammavācā saṅkhātāya
anya-e0401n0:43_21: pana saṅghasammutiyā siddhattā tena pariyāyena sammuti kammanti vuccatīti. ‘‘Upasampannabhūmiṁ
anya-e0401n0:43_22: patvā’’ti upasampannabhūmi saṅkhātaṁ upariṭhānantaraṁ patvā. Tathā hi vuttaṁ vinaye
anya-e0401n0:43_23: bhikkhu vibhaṅge. Ñatti catutthena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahenāti. Tattha, ‘‘ṭhānārahenā’’ti
anya-e0401n0:43_24: upasampanna bhūmisaṅkhātaṁ ṭhānantaraṁ pāpetuṁ arahenāti attho. ‘‘Upasampannabhūmī’’ti
anya-e0401n0:43_25: ca upasampanna sīlaṁ vuccati. ‘‘Vinayakammesu pasiddho’’ti. Suṇātumebhante saṅgho
anya-e0401n0:43_26: tiādīsu pākaṭo. Apica ‘‘sammuti saṅgho’’ti, devasaṅghāsamāgatātiādīsu viya bahūnaṁ
anya-e0401n0:43_27: samūhanaṭṭhena lokasammutiyā siddhosaṅgho sammuti saṅghotipi yujjati. ‘‘Ariyapuggalasamūho’’ti
anya-e0401n0:43_28: puthujjanakalyāṇako bhikkhu pubbe vuttanayena sotāpatti maggaṭṭhe saṅgahitoti, tena
anya-e0401n0:43_29: saha aṭṭhavidho ariya puggalasamūho. ‘‘Sammuti saṅghe antogadhoyevā’’ti etena dakkhiṇeyyasaṅgho
anya-e0401n0:43_30: nāma visuṁ navattabbo. Tasmiñca navattabbe sati, sammuti saṅghotipi vattabba kiccaṁ
anya-e0401n0:43_31: natthi. Bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho tveva vattabbaṁ hotīti dasseti. Saccametaṁ. Idha pana
anya-e0401n0:43_32: saṅghavacanena āgataṭṭhānassa duvidhattā saṅghassa duvidhatā vuttā. Tattha sammuti
anya-e0401n0:43_33: saṅghassa āgataṭṭhānaṁ vinayakammesūti vuttameva. Idāni ariyasaṅghassa āgataṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:43_34: dassento ‘‘tathāpī’’tiādimāha. Tattha saraṇa gamana…pe… anussatiṭṭhānesu upasampannabhūto
anya-e0401n0:43_35: bhikkhusaṅghova gahetabbo. Dakkhiṇāvisuddhiṭṭhāne pana puggalikadānesu catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi
anya-e0401n0:43_36: samannāgato upāsakopi sāmaṇeropi yujjati. Saṅghika dānesu pana bhikkhusaṅghova. ‘‘Tathā
anya-e0401n0:43_37: tathā saṁvaṇṇetvā’’ti āhuneyyo, pāhuneyyo, dakkhiṇeyyo, añjalīkaraṇīyyo, anuttaraṁ
anya-e0401n0:43_38: puññakkhettaṁ lokassā, tiādināsuṭṭhu thometvā. So dakkhiṇeyya saṅgho. ‘‘Puthujjana
anya-e0401n0:43_39: saṅgho’’ti idaṁ ariya saṅghena vinākevalaṁ puthujjanasaṅghaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. Ettha
anya-e0401n0:43_40: ca saṅgha vacanena saṅgha pariyāpanno ekopi bhikkhu gahetabbo. So sace puthujjano
anya-e0401n0:43_41: hoti, anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ nahoti. Yadi ariya puggalo hoti, anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:44_0: Dakkhiṇavibhaṅgasutte saṅghikadāne bhavissanti kho panānanda gotrabhuno kāsāvakaṇṭhā
anya-e0401n0:44_1: dussīlā pāpadhammā. Tesaṁpi saṅghaṁ uddissa dānaṁ dassanti. Tadāpānanda saṅghagataṁ
anya-e0401n0:44_2: dakkhiṇaṁ asaṅkhyeyyaṁ appameyyanti vadāmīti vuttattā saṅghikaṭṭhānaṁ patvā koci
anya-e0401n0:44_3: bhikkhu dakkhiṇeyya saṅghe asaṅgahitoti natthīti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0401n0:45: Khettaṁ dūsentīti khettaduṭṭhāni. Tiṇāni. Khettaduṭṭhā kilesā. Vuttañhidhammapade.
anya-e0401n0:52_0: Idha pana sātissayato khettaduṭṭhe kilese dassetuṁ ‘‘sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchānusayāna’’nti
anya-e0401n0:54_0: 8. ‘‘Abhivādiyā’’ti sukhīhohisappurisāti evaṁ abhivadāpetvā. Abhivādanañca nāma vandanāmevāti
anya-e0401n0:54_1: vuttaṁ ‘‘vanditvā’’ti. Vandantohi vandaneyye vuddhe tathā vadāpeti nāma. Tathā vadanañca
anya-e0401n0:54_5: arahaṁ sammāsambuddhotiādipadāni. Etthacakāyenavandatītiādi upacāra vacanaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n0:54_6: Yathā cakkhunā rūpaṁ passatīti. Tathāhi vuttaṁ aṭṭhakathāsu cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvāti
anya-e0401n0:54_7: karaṇavasena cakkhūti laddhavohārena rūpadassana samatthena cakkhu viññāṇena rūpaṁ
anya-e0401n0:54_8: disvā. Porāṇā panāhu cakkhu rūpaṁ na passati, acittattā. Cittaṁ na passati, acakkhuttā.
anya-e0401n0:54_9: Dvārārammaṇa saṅghaṭṭane pana sati cakkhu pasādavatthu kenacittena passati. Īdisī
anya-e0401n0:54_10: panesā kathā dhanunā vijjhatītiādīsu viya sasambhāra kathānāma hoti. Tasmā cakkhunā
anya-e0401n0:54_11: rūpaṁ disvāti cakkhu viññāṇena rūpaṁ disvāti ayamevettha atthoti. Etthahi ‘‘kāyenā’’ti
anya-e0401n0:54_12: kāya viññattisaṅkhātaṁ dvāra rūpaṁ karaṇaṁ hoti. Tasmā cakkhunāti vacane upacāra
anya-e0401n0:54_13: vacane sati kāyenāti vacanaṁpi upacāra vacananti viññāyati. Tathā cakkhunāti pade
anya-e0401n0:54_14: cakkhuviññāṇenāti atthe sati kāyenāti padepi kāyakammenāti attho viññāyati. Vācāya
anya-e0401n0:54_15: vandati, manasāvandatī,ti padesupi esanayo. Evañca sati, kāya kammenavandāmi, vacīkammena
anya-e0401n0:54_16: vandāmi, manokammena vandāmi, tīhi kammehi vandāmīti idameva mukhyavacananti siddhaṁ
anya-e0401n0:54_17: hoti. Sabbamidaṁ indriya saṁvarasīlaṭṭhāne aṭṭhakathāsu āgatattā vuttaṁ. Cakkhunāti
anya-e0401n0:54_18: idaṁ pana mukhya karaṇa vacanameva sambhavati. Kasmā, cakkhussa dassanasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0401n0:54_19: cakkhuviññāṇassa vatthu purejātindriyapaccayavisesattā. Sotena saddaṁsutvātiādīsupi esanayo.
anya-e0401n0:55_0: Kāyenavandati, vācāyavandatī,ti ettha taṁkāyavacīviññatti rūpa dvayaṁ kiñcāpi sahajāta
anya-e0401n0:55_1: cetanā kammena jātaṁ hoti. Na taṁ cetanākammaṁ viññatti dvayenajātaṁ. Evaṁ santepi
anya-e0401n0:55_2: taṁ rūpa dvayaṁ tassācetanāya kāyavandanākamma, vacīvandanākamma siddhiyā upanissaya
anya-e0401n0:55_3: paccayaviseso hoti. Yathātaṁ mātito jāto putto vuddhi patto taṁ taṁ kammesu mātuyā
anya-e0401n0:55_4: bala vūpanissayo hoti. Evañca katvā taṁ rūpadvayaṁ abhidhamme dvārarūpanti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:55_5: Tasmā ‘kāyena, vācāyā,ti idaṁpi mukhya karaṇa vacanamevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Kāyenāti pana
anya-e0401n0:55_6: kāyakammenāti atthe sati, tassakammassa vandanākiriyāya saha abhedo āpajjatīti ce.
anya-e0401n0:55_7: Nāpajjati. Kasmā cetanāhaṁ bhikkhave kammaṁ vadāmi, cetayitvā kammaṁ karoti ‘kāyena,
anya-e0401n0:55_8: vācāya, manasāti imasmiṁ sutte yathāhi ‘‘cetayitvā’’ti purimacetanāhi ceta yitvā
anya-e0401n0:55_9: . ‘‘Kammaṁ karotī’’ti pacchimaṁ sanniṭṭhāpana cetanā kammaṁ karotīti attho. Tathā
anya-e0401n0:55_10: idhapi purimapacchimacetanā sambhavatoti. Ettha hi ‘‘kāyakammenā’’ti purimacetanā
anya-e0401n0:56: 9. ‘‘Racayanto’’ti vidahanto. ‘‘Racayissatī’’ti apaccakkhe atīte anāgatavacanaṁ. ‘‘Potthakāruḷha’’nti potthaka pattesulikhanavasena āruḷhaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:57_2: Kasmātaṁ pāḷidvayaṁ abhidhammo nāmāti vuttaṁ ‘‘tañcā’’tiādi. ‘‘Yathāpavatte’’ti attano
anya-e0401n0:57_3: paccayānurūpaṁ pavatte. ‘‘Paramatthadhamme evā’’ti dve me bhikkhave puggalā, tayomebhikkhave
anya-e0401n0:57_4: puggalātiādinā paññattivohārena pavattāpi desanā paramattha dhammehi vinā napavattati.
anya-e0401n0:57_5: Paramattha dhammānaṁ nānattavaseneva puggalānaṁ nānattasambhavato. Tasmā paramatthadhamme
anya-e0401n0:57_6: eva dīpeti. Na āṇāvidhānaṁ dīpeti. ‘‘Dvīsudhammesū’’ti niddhāraṇe bhummavacanaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:57_7: ‘‘Yoitarato’’ti niddhāraṇīyaṁ. ‘‘Yo’’ti yo dhammo. ‘‘Itarato’’ti itara dhammato suttanta
anya-e0401n0:57_8: dhammato. ‘‘Evañca katvā’’ti iminākāraṇenāti attho. Aṭṭhakathāsu vuttanti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:57_9: Desetabbappakārānaṁ anavasesavibhattivasena atirekatā, suddha dhammādhiṭṭhāna desanā
anya-e0401n0:57_10: pavattivasena visesatā yojetabbā. ‘‘Yato’’ti yasmā anavasesavibhattito, ativitthāradesanābhāvatoti
anya-e0401n0:57_11: vuttaṁ hoti. Kasmā devesu eva desentīti āha ‘‘na hi manussā’’tiādiṁ. Tattha ‘‘na
anya-e0401n0:57_12: hi manussā paṭiggahetuṁ sakkontī’’ti sambandho. ‘‘Pavattanayogya’’nti pavattanatthāya
anya-e0401n0:57_14: dhammā akusalā dhammātiādikaṁ ekaṁ abhidhamma mātikaṁ anugatā. ‘‘Tassā’’ti abhidhammassa.
anya-e0401n0:57_15: Atireka visesatanti sambandho. ‘‘Tatthā’’ti tissaṁ aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ. Ādimhiyevatattha
anya-e0401n0:57_16: kenaṭṭhena abhidhammo, dhammātireka dhammavisesaṭṭhe nā-ti vatvā tadatthaṁ vitthārento
anya-e0401n0:57_17: suttañhi patvā pañcakkhandhā ekadeseneva vibhattā, nanippadesena. Abhidhammaṁ patvā
anya-e0401n0:57_19: panā’’ti pāḷidvayamāha.‘‘Evaṁ santepī’’ti aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ evaṁ vicāritepisati. ‘‘Sabbajeṭṭhako’’ti
anya-e0401n0:57_20: tiṇṇaṁ piṭakānaṁ majjhesabbajeṭṭhako. Kasmā sabbajeṭṭhako siyāti āha ‘‘vinayaṁ vivaṇṇentassahī’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:57_21: Tattha ‘‘vivaṇṇentassā’’ti garahantassa. Carati pavattatīti cakkaṁ. Lokasmiṁ kenaci
anya-e0401n0:57_22: samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā paṭinivattituṁ asakkuṇeyyaṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_23: āṇāvidhānaṁ āṇācakkaṁ nāma. Tathā asakkuṇeyyaṁ desanā vidhānaṁ dhammacakkaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n0:57_24: Tattha, yo pana bhikkhu methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, pārājiko hoti asaṁvāso-tiādinā
anya-e0401n0:57_25: nayena pavattaṁ āṇāvidhānaṁ āṇācakkaṁ nāma. Cattārimāni bhikkhave ariyasaccānī-tiādikaṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_26: desanāvidhānaṁ dhammacakkaṁ nāma. Tadubhayaṁpi koci bhindituṁ pārājikaṁ vā bhikkhuṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_27: apārājikaṁ kātuṁ catussaccaṁ vā dhammaṁ asaccaṁ kātuṁ nasakkoti. Atha kho karontoyeva
anya-e0401n0:57_28: devadattoviya āpāyiko hoti. Pārājikoca bhikkhu attānaṁ suddhaṁ akaronto apāyagāmīyeva
anya-e0401n0:57_29: hoti. Evaṁ sabbesu vinaya sikkhāpadesu. Evaṁ kenaci paṭinivattituṁ asakkuṇeyyattā
anya-e0401n0:57_30: tadubhayaṁpi appaṭivattiyaṁ cakkaṁ nāma hoti. ‘‘Vinayo nāma sāsanassa mūla’’nti vinaye
anya-e0401n0:57_31: ṭhite bhikkhusaṅgho paññāyati. Bhikkhu saṅghe paññāyante tividhopisaddhammopaññāyati,
anya-e0401n0:57_32: tividhaṁpi satthusāsanaṁ tiṭṭhati. Evaṁ vinayo tividhassasāsanassa mūlaṁ hotīti.
anya-e0401n0:57_33: Kathañcapariyattisaddhamme paññāyante tividhaṁpi sāsanaṁ tiṭṭhatīti. Vuccate. Tattha
anya-e0401n0:57_34: sāsanaṁ tiṭṭhatīti kittakaṁkālaṁ tiṭṭhatīti. Pañcavassasahassāni tiṭṭhatīti porāṇaṭṭhakathāsukathayiṁsu.
anya-e0401n0:57_35: Micchāvādinopanavadanti vinaye cūḷavaggebhikkhunikkhandhake sace ānanda mamasāsanemātugāmo
anya-e0401n0:57_36: pabbajjaṁ nalabheyya. Vassasahassaṁ saddhammo tiṭṭheyya. Idāni mātugāmassa pabbajjā
anya-e0401n0:57_37: anuññātā gotamiyā punappunaṁ āyācanaṁ upādāya. Pañcevadāni ānanda vassasatāni saddhammoṭhassatīti
anya-e0401n0:57_38: vuttaṁ. Tasmā buddhasāsanaṁ pañcavassasatāni eva tiṭṭhati. Tatoparaṁ ekadivasaṁpi
anya-e0401n0:57_39: na tiṭṭhati. Idāni sāsanappaṭi rūpakamattaṁ hotīti. Taṁ tesaṁ micchā vacanamattaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:57_40: ‘‘Pañcevavassasatānī’’ti idaṁ pana sanniṭṭhāna vacanaṁ nahoti. Mātugāmānaṁ ādīnava
anya-e0401n0:57_41: dīpanamattavacanaṁ. So ca ādīnavo aṭṭhagarudhamme saṇṭhapetvā satthārā eva paṭibāhito.
anya-e0401n0:57_42: Puna ‘‘vassasahassa’’nti idamevasanniṭṭhāna vacanaṁ jātanti. Etthapikecivadanti vassasahassameva
anya-e0401n0:57_43: sāsanaṁ tiṭṭhati, tatoparaṁ ekadivasa mattaṁpi na tiṭṭhati, antaradhāyati. Tadā sīmāyopi
anya-e0401n0:57_44: asīmā honti. Pacchātāsu upasampāditāpi anupasampannā honti. Idāni sāsanappaṭi rūpakamattaṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_45: hotīti. Idaṁpi tesaṁ atthañcakāraṇañca adisvā ajānitvā vuttattā micchā vacanamattaṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_46: hoti. Ayaṁ panettha attho. ‘‘Vassasahassaṁ saddhammo tiṭṭheyyā’’ti vassasahassameva
anya-e0401n0:57_47: saddhammo aparihāyamāno tiṭṭheyya. Tatoparaṁ pana na tiṭṭheyya, anukkamena parihāyamāno
anya-e0401n0:57_48: gaccheyyāti. Kathaṁ pana aparihāyamāno tiṭṭhati, kathañca parihāyamāno gacchatīti.
anya-e0401n0:57_49: Vuccate. Pañcasaṅghā veditabbā. Yesu saṅghe susaddhammo tiṭṭhati. Katame pañca. Khīṇāsavasaṅgho,
anya-e0401n0:57_51: vassasahassabbhantare sabbepañcasaṅghā paññāyanti. Evaṁ vassasahassaṁ saddhammo aparihāyamāno
anya-e0401n0:57_52: tiṭṭhati. Tatoparaṁ khīṇāsavasaṅgho na paññāyati. Sesāni cattārivassasahassāni anukkamena
anya-e0401n0:57_53: sesānaṁ catunnaṁ saṅghānaṁ khettāni jātāni. Evaṁ tatoparaṁ parihāyamāno gacchatīti
anya-e0401n0:57_54: ayamettha attho. Kāraṇaṁ vuccate. ‘‘Saddhammo tiṭṭheyyā’’ti ettha tividho saddhammo
anya-e0401n0:57_55: ‘pariyattisaddhammo, paṭipattisaddhammo, paṭivedhasaddhammo,ti. So eva tividhaṁ sāsananti
anya-e0401n0:57_56: ca vuccati. Tattha, pariyatti saddhammo nāma sāṭṭhakathānitīṇipiṭakāni. Soca etarahi
anya-e0401n0:57_57: paripuṇṇo tiṭṭhati. Kathaṁ pariyatti sāsanaṁ paṭirūpakamattaṁ bhaveyya. Bhikkhū ca
anya-e0401n0:57_58: pariyattikammikā aneka satasahassamattā paññāyanti. Kathañcidaṁ sāsanaṁ tatoparaṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_59: ekadivasaṁpi na tiṭṭheyya. Te ca bhikkhū sīlappaṭipattiyaṁ ṭhitā aneka satasahassamattā
anya-e0401n0:57_60: etarahi sandhissanti. Kathañca paṭipatti sāsanaṁ tatoparaṁ na tiṭṭheyya. Pariyattiyāca
anya-e0401n0:57_61: paṭipattiyāca tiṭṭhamānāyapaṭivedhasaddhammopi na tiṭṭhatīti na vattabbo. Yathāhi-eko
anya-e0401n0:57_62: dhanaseṭṭhi nāma atthi. So puttadhītu paramparānaṁ atthāya mahantāratananidhayo bhūmiyaṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_63: bahūsuṭṭhānesu nidahitvā ṭhapitā honti. Potthakesu ca tesaṁ pavattiṁ paripuṇṇaṁ likhitvā
anya-e0401n0:57_64: ṭhapeti. Tattha nimīsu ca potthakesu ca akkharesu ca dharantesu tenidhayo nassanti
anya-e0401n0:57_65: antaradhāyantīti na vattabbāyeva. Evamidaṁ sāsanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Tatthahi nidhīnaṁnidhānabhūmisadisaṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_66: tepiṭakaṁ buddhavacanaṁ, dhanaratanasadisāni dhammaratanāni. Yathā ca seṭṭhivaṁsejāto
anya-e0401n0:57_67: balasampanno puriso potthakaṁ passitvā suṭṭhu khaṇanto tāniratanāni labhissatiyeva.
anya-e0401n0:57_68: Evamidhapi balasampanno bhikkhu desanādhammaṁ sutvā suṭṭhu paṭipajjanto tānidhammaratanāni
anya-e0401n0:57_69: labhissatiyeva. Labhamāne ca sati, kathaṁ tānidhammaratanāni antarahitāni. Sīmānañca
anya-e0401n0:57_70: pavattivānivatti vā āṇācakkasseva visayo hoti. Na dhammacakkassa. Yañca vuttaṁ-pañcevavassasatānisaddhammo
anya-e0401n0:57_71: ṭhassatīti ca, - vassasahassaṁ saddhammo tiṭṭheyyāti ca. Idañca vacanaṁ dhammacakkameva
anya-e0401n0:57_72: hoti, na āṇācakkaṁ. Baddhasīmāyo ca nivattamānā dvīhi kāraṇehi nivattanti antaradhāyanti.
anya-e0401n0:57_73: Āṇācakkabhūtāya kammavācāya samūhananena vā, sāsanassa vā antaradhānena. Tattha vassasahassapariyante
anya-e0401n0:57_74: kammavācāya samūhananañca natthi. Sāsanantaradhānañca nāma anāgate dhātuparinibbānena
anya-e0401n0:57_75: paricchinnaṁ hoti. Dhātuparinibbānehi jāte sabbaṁ āṇācakkaṁ vigataṁ hoti, antaradhāyati.
anya-e0401n0:57_76: Dhammacakkaṁ pana devalokesu yāvānāgatabuddhakālāpi pavattissatiyeva āḷavakapucchāgāthāyo
anya-e0401n0:57_77: viya. Apicayo vo ānanda mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto. So vo mamaccayena
anya-e0401n0:57_78: satthā-ti vuttaṁ. Socati piṭakabhūto dhammavinayo satthā etarahi tividhaṁpi sāsanaṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_79: lokassa dīpento pakāsento tiṭṭhati. Yatobuddhabhāsikānaṁ devamanussānaṁ nānā bāhirakehi
anya-e0401n0:57_80: janehi asādhāraṇo mahanto ñāṇāloko etarahi vijjotamāno pavattati. Tehi sabbaññutaññāṇena
anya-e0401n0:57_81: desitāni etarahidharamānāni caturāsīti dhammakkhandha sahassāni sutvā anamataggesaṁsāre
anya-e0401n0:57_83: sutamayaññāṇena jānanti. Āyatiñca saggatthāya ca maggaphalanibbānatthāya ca nānāpuññakiriyavatthūni
anya-e0401n0:57_84: ārabhanti, pabbajanti. Pariyattiṁ pariyāpuṇanti. Paṭipattiṁ pūrenti. Bhāvanaṁbhāventi.
anya-e0401n0:57_85: Idaṁ sabbaṁ sāsanappaṭirūpakamattaṁna hoti. Ekanta sāsanaṁ hoti. Kasmā, yathā dhammaṁ
anya-e0401n0:57_86: yathā vinayaṁ paṭipajjanato. Imāya ca paṭipattiyā āyatiṁ saggamaggaphala nibbānappaṭilābhāya
anya-e0401n0:57_87: saṁvattanikattāti. Ettāvatā sabbaṁ micchāvādīnaṁ micchāvacanaṁ vidhamitaṁviddhaṁsitaṁ hotīti.
anya-e0401n0:59_3: vutta’’nti napanapakaraṇaṁpi pubbevuttaṁ hoti. Abhidhammatthā kutopubbevuttā hontīti
anya-e0401n0:59_4: yojanā. Evaṁtīsu atthavikappesu pathamassa kālavirodhaṁ dassetvā idāni dutīya tatīyānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:59_5: saddatovirodhaṁ vattuṁ ‘‘nacā’’tiādimāha. Tattha ‘‘ādimhi yevā’’ti etena yadākadāci
anya-e0401n0:59_7: imasmiṁ ekasmiṁ samāsapade purimāni visesana padāni. Tattha sabbathāpi vuttāti yojite
anya-e0401n0:59_8: sati, tasmiṁ abhidhammatthasaṅgahappakaraṇe tasmiṁ abhidhammattha padevā sabbathā
anya-e0401n0:59_9: mayā vuttāti attho hoti. So na yujjati. Tasmiṁ abhidhamme buddhena bhagavatā sabbathā
anya-e0401n0:59_10: vuttāti attho yujjati. Appadhānapadaṁ paccāmasatīti dosopana āpajjateva. Tenāha ‘‘evañhisatī’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:59_11: Tattha, ‘‘evañhisatī’’ti aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ viya idha abhidhammatthasaṅgahapadaṁ paccāmasante
anya-e0401n0:59_12: sati. Hisaddo phala vākyajotako. Laddhaguṇajotakotipi yujjati. ‘‘Paṭikkhittā hoti’’
anya-e0401n0:59_13: tasmiṁ abhidhammatthasaṅgahapade mayā sabbathā vuttāti atthassa sambhavato. Na kevalaṁ
anya-e0401n0:59_14: so eva doso āpajjati. Aparopidoso atthīti dassetuṁ ‘‘sāhī’’tiādimāha. Dhātukathāyaṁ
anya-e0401n0:60_0: 12. Paramatthapadavaṇṇanāyaṁ. Visesanapadaṁ nāma katthaci bhūtakathanatthāyavā payujjati
anya-e0401n0:60_1: kaṇhokāko, setobako,ti. Katthaci aññanivattanatthāya vā payujjati nīlopaṭo, nīlaṁpuppha,
anya-e0401n0:60_2: nti. Idha pana añña nivattanatthāyāti dassetuṁ ‘‘duvidhānihisaccānī’’tiādimāha. Paññāpīyatītipaññatti.
anya-e0401n0:60_3: Paññāpanañca nāma samaggānaṁ janānaṁ vohārena ca sampaṭicchanena cāti dvīhi aṅgehi
anya-e0401n0:60_4: sijjhatīti āha ‘‘tecamahājanā’’tiādiṁ. ‘‘Tasmāte sammuti saccanti vuccantī’’ti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:60_6: ettha vacīsaccaṁ nāma musāvādarahitaṁ saccavacanaṁ. Viratisaccaṁ nāma sammāvācāvirati.
anya-e0401n0:60_7: Sāhi musāvādādīhi vacīduccaritehi viramaṇamattena vacīsaccanti vuccati. ‘‘Vatthubhūtattā’’ti
anya-e0401n0:60_8: adhiṭṭhānabhūtattā. Sammutisaccanti vuccanti, sammatattā sammuti ca, sā saccānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:60_9: vatthubhūtattā saccañcāti katvā. Sammutiyā siddhaṁ saccaṁ sammutisaccantipi yujjati.
anya-e0401n0:60_10: ‘‘Sammāpaṭipajjantā’’ti pāṇo nahantabbo, sabbesattā averā hontūtiādinā sammāpaṭipajjantā.
anya-e0401n0:60_14: ‘‘Evaṁ mahantaṁ sammuti sacca’’nti etena ahaṁ paramattha saccamevagaṇhāmīti sammuti
anya-e0401n0:60_15: saccaṁ nabhinditabbaṁ. Bhindantohi sabbasampattīhi paribāhiro assāti dasseti. Kathañca
anya-e0401n0:60_16: taṁ bhindatīti. Satto nāma natthi. Sattassa bhavatosaṅkanti nāma natthi. Bhavanibbattakaṁ
anya-e0401n0:60_17: kusalākusalakammaṁ nāma natthīti gaṇhanto ucchedadiṭṭhiyaṁ tiṭṭhati. Sabbasampattīhi
anya-e0401n0:60_18: paribāhiro hoti. Apāya pūrako bhavatīti. ‘‘Vijjamānantveva gaṇhāpetī’’ti saññā cittadiṭṭhi
anya-e0401n0:60_20: sammutisacca’’nti etenasammuti saccamevadaḷhaṁ gahetvā paramattha saccaṁ nabhinditabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:60_21: Bhindantohi tāhi diṭṭhīhi namuccati. Kathañca taṁ bhindati. Khandhe vā khandhamuttakevā
anya-e0401n0:60_22: attajīve gahetvā teca attajīvā parammaraṇā ucchijjantīti gaṇhanto ucchedadiṭṭhiyaṁ
anya-e0401n0:60_23: tiṭṭhati. Te ca attajīvā bhavābhavesusassatā hutvā bhavatobhavaṁ saṁsaranti sandhāvantīti
anya-e0401n0:60_25: panā’’ti sabhāvasaccaṁ pana. Anubhavanabhedamattaṁ upādāyeva vedanā sukhāti vuttā.
anya-e0401n0:60_26: Sabbākārato sukhabhūtattā vedanā sukhāti vuttā nahoti. ‘‘Sabbāpivedanā dukkhā evā’’ti
anya-e0401n0:60_27: padhānattho. Tattha anubhavanabhedo tividho. Sātato vā anubhavanaṁ, assātato vā,
anya-e0401n0:60_28: majjhattato vā. ‘‘Dukkhā evā’’ti bhayaṭṭhena dukkhā eva. Bhayaṭṭhenāti ca saṁsāra
anya-e0401n0:60_29: bhayadassīhibhāyitabbaṭṭhena. Sukho vipāko yesaṁ te sukhavipākā. Tebhūmakakusalā.
anya-e0401n0:60_30: ‘‘Kusalasammatā’’ti etena sabhāvasaccepi etevohārā lokasammuti nissitāti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n0:60_31: ‘‘Sāsavatā’’ti āsavehi sahitabhāvo. ‘‘Saṁkilesi katā’’ti saṁkilesa dhammehi saṁyuttabhāvo.
anya-e0401n0:60_32: Oghehi ca yogehi ca upādānehi ca pattabbabhāvo ‘‘oghanīyayoganīya upādānīyatā’’.
anya-e0401n0:60_33: Adhikā attā ajjhattā. Bahiddhārukkherūpadhammārukkhassa attānāma sāraṭṭhena. Sākhāyaṁ
anya-e0401n0:60_34: rūpadhammā sākhāya attānāma sāraṭṭhena. Sattasantānapariyāpannā pana rūpārūpadhammā
anya-e0401n0:60_35: taṇhāpariggaha daḷhaṭṭhena tato bahiddhā attato adhikā attāti atthena ajjhattāti
anya-e0401n0:60_36: lokasammuti hoti. Tenāha ‘‘ajjhattatikañcā’’tiādiṁ. Dukkhanirodha maggabhāvo ca,
anya-e0401n0:60_37: iti idaṁ catukkaṁ ariyasaccaṁ nāmāti yojanā. ‘‘Idamevā’’ti idaṁ catukkameva. ‘‘Acalamāna’’nti
anya-e0401n0:60_38: etena ariyasaddassa atthaṁ dīpeti. Tebhūmaka dhammānaṁ sukhatā nāma calā hoti. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n0:60_39: anicca dhammattā. Te dhammesukhāti gahetvā attano ajjhattaṅgaṁ karontā acireneva
anya-e0401n0:60_40: dukkhaṁ pāpuṇanti. Te dhamme dukkhāti ñatvā tehivimuttā puna dukkhaṁ pāpuṇantīti
anya-e0401n0:60_41: natthi. Esanayo sesaariyasaccesu . ‘‘Tesū’’tiādimhi duvidhānihi saccānīti vuttesu
anya-e0401n0:60_42: dvīsu saccesu. ‘‘Tena vutta’’ntiādi laddhaguṇavacanaṁ. ‘‘Yo vinā aññāpadesenā’’ti
anya-e0401n0:60_43: ettha aññāpadeso nāma aṭṭhadhamma samodhānaṁ nissāya ghaṭasaṇṭhānaṁ paññāyati, paṭasaṇṭhānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:60_44: paññāyati, taṁ saṇṭhānaṁ attano sabhāvena vinā aññāpadesena siddhaṁ hoti. Yāpanacintana
anya-e0401n0:60_45: kiriyā nāma atthi. Yaṁ cittanti vuccati. Sā aññāpadesena siddhā na hoti. Attano sabhāvenevasiddhā.
anya-e0401n0:60_46: Esanayo phusanakiriyā, vedayitakiriyā, dīsūti. Imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘yovinā aññāpadesenā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:60_47: ‘‘Cittenaparikappetvā’’ti manoviññāṇa cittena avijjamānaṁ saṇṭhānaṁ vijjamānaṁ katvā.
anya-e0401n0:60_48: ‘‘Saviggahaṁ katvā’’ti sarīraṁ katvā. Vatthu dabbasahitaṁ katvāti vuttaṁ hoti. ‘‘Cittamayocittanimmito’’ti
anya-e0401n0:60_49: supinante diṭṭharūpāni viya cittenapakato cittena nimmito. Kasmā sabhāvasiddho paramattho
anya-e0401n0:60_50: nāmāti āha ‘‘sohī’’tiādiṁ. ‘‘Santī’’ti etena asadhātu vasena atthoti siddhaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:60_52: ‘‘Paramo’’ti adhiko. Tenāha ‘‘ukkaṁsagato’’ti. Etena paramasaddassa adhikatthaṁ vadati.
anya-e0401n0:60_53: Idāni tassa uttamatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘apicā’’tiādivuttaṁ. Tattha, imasmiṁ buddhasāsane
anya-e0401n0:60_54: pañcasāsana kiccāni mahantāni abhiññeyyānaṁ dhammānaṁ abhijānanaṁ. Pariññeyyānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:60_55: parijānanaṁ. Pahātabbānaṁ pahānaṁ. Sacchi kātabbānaṁ sacchikaraṇaṁ. Bhāvetabbānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:60_56: bhāvanāti. Tattha sabbepi paramattha dhammā abhiññeyyā nāma. Dukkha saccadhammā pariññeyyā
anya-e0401n0:60_57: nāma. Samudaya saccadhammā pahātabbā nāma. Sāmaññapphalāni ca nibbānañca sacchikātabbā
anya-e0401n0:60_58: nāma. Maggasaccadhammā bhāvetabbā nāma. Tesu dhammesu tesaṁ kiccānaṁ siddhiyā imasmiṁ
anya-e0401n0:60_59: sāsane sāsanakiccaṁ siddhaṁ hoti. Niṭṭhānaṁ gacchati. Te ca dhammā eva rūpānaṁ sāsana
anya-e0401n0:60_60: kiccānaṁ avirādhakattā avisaṁvādakattā uttamaṭṭhena paramatthā nāma hontīti imamatthaṁ
anya-e0401n0:61_0: ‘‘Taṁ nasundara’’nti byañjanato nasundaraṁ. Nakevalaṁ byañjanatoyeva nasundaraṁ,
anya-e0401n0:61_1: atthatopi nasundarameva. Catusacca dhammāhi paccekabuddhaññāṇassapi gocarā honti.
anya-e0401n0:61_2: Pañcañeyya dhammā pana sabbaññutaññāṇasseva. Tattha catusacca dhammā nāma paramattha
anya-e0401n0:61_3: dhammā eva. Pañcañeyyadhammā pana sabba paññattiyā saha sabbaparamattha dhammā. Sabbaññubuddhānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:61_4: catusaccābhi sambodho dhamma paññattiyā saha sijjhati. Paccekabuddhānaṁ catusacca
anya-e0401n0:61_5: sambodho dhammapaññattiyā saha nasijjhati. Tasmā te sayaṁ paṭividdhaṁ catusacca dhammaṁ
anya-e0401n0:61_6: nāma paññattiṁ nīharitvā paresaṁ desetuṁ na sakkonti. Tesaṁ catusaccasambodho mūgassa
anya-e0401n0:61_7: supinadassanaṁ viya hotīti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṁ. Tasmā paññattiyā saha pañca ñeyya
anya-e0401n0:63_0: 13. Cittavacanatthe. Nahi sā ārammaṇenavinā labbhati. Cintetīti vutte kiṁ cinteti,
anya-e0401n0:63_1: ārammaṇaṁ cintetīti evaṁ ārammaṇabhūtena kammapadena vinā asambhavato. Tasmā idha
anya-e0401n0:63_2: cintanāti daṭṭhabbā, tasmā assa nāmaṁ siddhanti daṭṭhabbanti sambandho. Sutamayaññāṇaṁ,
anya-e0401n0:63_3: cintāmayaññāṇa, nti ettha ārammaṇassa bhūtasabhāva cintāpi atthi, sāpaññāevāti taṁ
anya-e0401n0:63_4: nivattetuṁ ‘‘ārammaṇa…pe… ṇūpaladdhiyevā’’ti vuttaṁ. Cittaṁ, mano, mānasaṁ, viññāṇa,
anya-e0401n0:63_5: nti sabbaṁ cittassa nāmaṁ. Ārammaṇa paccayappaṭibaddhaṁ hoti. Na aññapaccayappaṭibaddhaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:63_6: Na ca aññapaccayena laddhaṁ nāmaṁ. Evarūpassa ārammaṇa vijānana saṅkhātassa atthantarassabodhakaṁ
anya-e0401n0:63_7: nahotīti dassetuṁ ‘‘santesu cā’’tiādivuttaṁ. ‘‘Etenā’’ti idaṁ kattuno kiriyāsādhane
anya-e0401n0:63_9: ettha mattasaddo visesanivatti atthoti, tena nivattitaṁ atthaṁ dasseti ‘‘sabbepihī’’tiādinā.
anya-e0401n0:63_10: ‘‘Viggaho vā’’ti sarīraṁ vā. Paccayena āyattā paccayāyattā. ‘‘Āyattā’’ti sambandhā.
anya-e0401n0:63_11: Vattanaṁ vutti. Uppajjanaṁ vā ṭhiti vā. Paccayāyattā vutti etesanti ‘‘paccayāyatta
anya-e0401n0:63_13: labbhatī’’ti idaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁ taṁ kiriyā mattabhāvaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. Kiriyāmattabhūtāpi
anya-e0401n0:63_14: pana te dhammāsayaṁ nānāpaccayā vatthāyaṁ ṭhitā vā honti nānāpaccayuppannāvatthāyaṁ
anya-e0401n0:63_15: ṭhitā vā. Tasmā paramattha padesupi yathārahaṁ tadaññasādhanānaṁ paṭilābho avārito
anya-e0401n0:63_16: hoti. Itarathā hetu paccayo, ārammaṇa paccayo, sahajātapaccayo, nissayapaccayotiādīsu
anya-e0401n0:63_17: kathaṁ bhāvasādhanaṁ yuttaṁ siyāti. ‘‘Padhānato’’ti mukhyato. ‘‘Abhedassa cintanassabhedakaraṇa’’nti
anya-e0401n0:63_18: idaṁ cintetīti cittantikataṁ kattusādhanaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. ‘‘Silāputtakassā’’ti
anya-e0401n0:63_19: bhesajjamūlānaṁ pisanasilāpotakassa. Tassa sarīraṁ nāma visuṁ aṅgaṁ natthi. Abhinnaṁpi
anya-e0401n0:63_20: bhinnaṁ katvā vuccati ‘‘silāputtakasarīra’’nti. Idaṁ abhedassabhedakaraṇaṁ nāma abhūtarūpaṁ
anya-e0401n0:63_21: hoti. Payojane sati vattabbaṁ, asati na vattabbanti āha ‘‘tathākaraṇañcā’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:63_23: kappanāyā’’ti sace attā atthi, attā cinteti, tasmā attā cittonāmātiādi vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:63_24: Na vattabbaṁ cintetīti cittanti, cittassa kiriyāmattattā. Na pana attādiko kattā
anya-e0401n0:63_25: nāma atthi. Tasmā kiriyā mattameva kattāraṁ katvā ‘‘cintetīti citta’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:63_26: Tena viññāyatiloke attādikokattā nāma natthīti. Idaṁ abhedassabheda parikappanāya
anya-e0401n0:63_27: payojananti vuttaṁ hoti. ‘‘Attappadhāno’’ti kiriyāsādhane bahūnaṁkārakānaṁ majjhe
anya-e0401n0:63_29: karaṇabhāva’’nti puna loke siddhaṁ karaṇabhāvaṁ. Evaṁ cittassa vacanatthaṁ dassetvā
anya-e0401n0:63_30: idāni tassa abhidhānatthaṁ dassento ‘‘apicetthā’’tiādimāha. Yathayidaṁ ye ime tiracchānagatā
anya-e0401n0:63_31: pāṇā cittāvicittā. Evaṁ cittaṁ vicittaṁ yaṁ aññaṁ atthi, taṁ aññaṁ ekanikāyaṁpi nasamanupassāmī-ti
anya-e0401n0:63_33: karaṇavacanaṁ. Etena tato caraṇato cittatoti atthaṁ vadati. Gāthāyaṁ. ‘‘Taṁ taṁ sabhāvo’’ti
anya-e0401n0:63_35: dhammena karaṇakiccañca, taṁ kiccaṁ katvā laddho sampattiguṇo ca. Aggissa vatthumhi
anya-e0401n0:63_36: paripācanakiccaṁ viya, obhāsanaguṇoviya ca. ‘‘Gayhākāro’’ti ñāṇena gahetabbo tassa
anya-e0401n0:63_37: tassa dhammassa dhajabhūto ākāro. Sampatti rasoyeva vuccati. ‘‘Phalaṁvāpī’’ti kāriyapphalaṁ
anya-e0401n0:63_38: vāpi, aggissa dhūmoviya. ‘‘Āsannakāraṇa’’nti attano anantare phalanibbattakaṁ kāraṇaṁ,
anya-e0401n0:63_39: aggissa aggikāraka puriso viya. ‘‘Ala’’nti samatthā. ‘‘Vibuddhino’’ti visesabuddhi
anya-e0401n0:65_0: 14. ‘‘Cetasi bhava’’nti cittasmiṁ pātubhūtaṁ. ‘‘Etena siddhā hontī’’ti sambandho.
anya-e0401n0:65_1: ‘‘Sā eva phassādīnaṁ jāti. Yācittassajarā, sā eva phassādīnaṁjarā’’tiādinā yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:65_3: ekajātikathā divasena upanibandhā. ‘‘Ce’’ti cevadeyya. ‘‘Nā’’ti na vattabbaṁ. Gāthāyaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:65_4: ‘‘Dhammā’’ti nāmakkhandha dhammā. ‘‘Manasā evā’’ti kattubhūtena manena eva. ‘‘Pakatā’’ti
anya-e0401n0:65_5: pavattitā. ‘‘Nimmitā’’ti nipphāditā. ‘‘Cittakiriyā bhūtā evā’’ti ārammaṇaṁ vijānantaṁ
anya-e0401n0:65_6: cittaṁ phusanākāraṁ janetvāva vijānāti. So phusanākāro phassoti vuccati. Avasesā
anya-e0401n0:65_7: pana sabbepi cetasikadhammā phassaṁ paṭicca uppajjanti. Phasso hetu phasso paccayo
anya-e0401n0:65_8: vedanākkhandhassa upādāya. Saññākkhandhassa. Saṅkhārakkhandhassa upādāyāti hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:65_9: Evaṁ santepi cittamūlakattā cittanissitattā ca tepidhammā cittakiri yābhūtā eva hontīti.
anya-e0401n0:65_10: ‘‘Etenā’’ti etenagāthāpadena. Vibhāvaniyaṁ pana ekālambaṇatā mattena vibhāveti. Paripuṇṇāni
anya-e0401n0:65_11: ce tasikaṅgāni upari therena sayameva vakkhamānattāti adhippāyo. Idha pana padatthavibhāvanaṭṭhānattā
anya-e0401n0:65_12: paripuṇṇehi aṅgehi vibhāvetuṁ vaṭṭatīti āha ‘‘taṁ nasundara’’nti. ‘‘Vatthumhī’’ti
anya-e0401n0:65_14: kusalanti vā akusalanti vā vattabbaṁ natthi. Nānācetasike hi yuttattā eva tathā vattabbaṁ
anya-e0401n0:65_15: hoti. Vuttaṁhetaṁ bhagavatā. Pabhassaramidaṁ bhikkhave cittaṁ. Tañca kho āgantukehi
anya-e0401n0:67_0: 15. Ruppatīti padaṁ kattarivāhetukammanivāsiddhaṁ. Ruppanañcavikārāpatti evāti dassetuṁ
anya-e0401n0:67_2: Dhātukkho bhavasenāti vuttaṁ hoti, ‘‘kenaruppatī’’ti ettha ‘‘kenā’’ti hetu atthevā
anya-e0401n0:67_3: hetu kattarivā karaṇavacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Tathā sītenātiādīsupi. Ḍaṁsamakasā nāma
anya-e0401n0:67_4: sūcimukhā khuddakamakkhikāceva mahanta makkhikā ca. Vātā nāma puratthimavātādayo.
anya-e0401n0:67_5: Ātapo nāma sūriyātapo. Sariṁsapānāma ahi vicchika satapadikādayo. Tesaṁ samphassehipi
anya-e0401n0:67_6: ruppati. Maraṇaṁ vā gacchati, maraṇa mattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ. ‘‘Ye dhammā’’ti dvādasavidhā
anya-e0401n0:67_8: ‘‘Tesū’’ti niddhāraṇebhummaṁ. Idāni pāḷiyā saddhiṁ mukhyaruppanaṁ saṁsandento ‘‘samāgamo
anya-e0401n0:67_9: cā’’tiādimāha. Samāgamo ca nāma aññamaññābhighaṭṭanaṁ vuccatīti sambandho. Āpātāgamanañca
anya-e0401n0:67_10: ārammaṇakaraṇañca ṭhapetvāti yojanā. ‘‘Mahābhūtānameva vā’’ti āpodhātu vajjitānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:67_11: tiṇṇaṁ mahābhūtānameva vā. ‘‘Vikāraṁ āpajjatī’’ti vatvā tamevatthaṁ vivaranto ‘‘yasmiṁ
anya-e0401n0:67_12: khaṇe’’tiādimāha. ‘‘Sayaṁpi vikārapattā hontī’’ti temahābhūtāsayaṁpi pakatiṁ vijahitvā
anya-e0401n0:67_14: uppajjamānā rūpasantatiyo sandhāya vuttaṁ. Evaṁ pāḷinayena vipattivasena ruppanaṁ
anya-e0401n0:67_15: vatvā idāni vipatti vā hotu, sampatti vā. Purimapacchi masantatīnaṁ visadisappavattibhūto
anya-e0401n0:67_16: vikāropi ekena pariyāyena ruppanaṁnāmāti katvā puna taṁ ruppanaṁ dassento ‘‘apicetthā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:67_19: hontī’’ti dabba saṇṭhānākārasahitā honti. Kasmā, oḷārikasabhāvattā. Bahūnañcarūpakalāpānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:67_20: ekakkhaṇe ekābaddhabhāvenapavattattā. Arūpadhammāhi saṇhasukhumasabhāvā ca honti.
anya-e0401n0:67_21: Sace anekasatasahassānipi ekato pavatteyyuṁ. Dabbasaṇṭhānabhāvaṁ nagamissantiyeva.
anya-e0401n0:67_22: Ekasmiñca sattasantāne ekakkhaṇe eka kalāpova pavattati. Kasmā, anantara paccayūpanibandhena
anya-e0401n0:67_23: pavattattā. Tasmāte saviggahāna honti. Rūpadhammā pana oḷārika sabhāvā ca honti.
anya-e0401n0:67_24: Bahūnaṁ sannicayesati dabbasaṇṭhānatthāya saṁvattanti. Ekakkhaṇe ca bahukalāpāpi
anya-e0401n0:68_1: paccakkhato pākaṭassa sītādivacanassasāmatthiyena. Tañhi vacanaṁ lokassa apākaṭaṁ
anya-e0401n0:68_2: arūpadhammānaṁ ruppanaṁ idhanādhippetanti dīpetīti adhippāyo. ‘‘Vohāro nāmā’’ti nāmasaññā
anya-e0401n0:68_3: nāmāti vuttaṁ hoti. ‘‘Lokopacārenā’’ti bahujanassa upacārena vohārena kathanena.
anya-e0401n0:68_5: vināpī’’ti pisaddena sītādiggahaṇasāmatthiyenapīti dīpeti. Evaṁ santepi pāḷisādhakaṁ
anya-e0401n0:68_6: nāma na sakkāsabbattha laddhuṁ. Pākaṭanimitta vacanameva sabbattha sādhāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:68_9: saññāsiddhi. ‘‘Idaṁ panā’’ti idaṁ rūpaṁ pana. ‘‘Anuggahānaṁ sītādīnaṁ vasenā’’ti
anya-e0401n0:68_10: kiñcāpipāḷiyaṁ sītādivacanaṁ upaghātakānaṁ sītādīnaṁ vasena vuttaṁ. Teca brahmaloke
anya-e0401n0:68_11: natthi. Anuggāhakā eva atthi. Tesaṁvasenāti adhippāyo. ‘‘Pāḷiyaṁ niddiṭṭhānī’’ti
anya-e0401n0:68_12: sañjānātīti kho bhikkhave tasmā saññāti vuccati. Kiñca sañjānāti. Nīlaṁpi sañjānāti,
anya-e0401n0:68_13: pītampi sañjānātī-tiādinā ca, vijānātīti kho bhikkhave tasmā viññāṇanti vuccati.
anya-e0401n0:68_14: Kiñca vijānāti. Madhuraṁpi vijānāti, ambilaṁpi vijānātī-tiādinā ca-pāḷiyaṁ niddiṭṭhāni.
anya-e0401n0:70_0: 16. Nibbānapade. ‘‘Khandhāvā’’ti bhavantare apāyādīsu bhavissamānā khandhāvā. Na
anya-e0401n0:70_1: hi atīta dhammā, nibbāyanti nāma, satte pīḷetvā niruddhattāti adhippāyo. Paccuppannā
anya-e0401n0:70_2: ca dhammā etarahi pīḷenti, avassaṁ uppajjamānā anāgatadhammā ca anāgate pīḷessanti,
anya-e0401n0:70_3: kathaṁ te nibbāyanti nāmāti āha ‘‘paccuppannesu…pe… vattabbameva natthī’’ti. ‘‘Visayebhumma’’nti
anya-e0401n0:70_4: visayādhārebhummaṁ. Visayādhāro nāmamanussābhūmiyaṁ gacchantītiādīsu viya mukhyādhāro
anya-e0401n0:70_5: nahoti. Tena pana vinā aññattha taṁ kiriyaṁ kātuṁ nasakkoti. Tasmā ādhārabhāvena
anya-e0401n0:70_6: parikappito ādhāroti dassetuṁ ‘‘yathāākāse’’tiādivuttaṁ. Yathā sakuṇānaṁ pakkhana
anya-e0401n0:70_7: kiriyā nāma ākāsena vinā aññattha nasijjhati. Tathā vaṭṭadukkhadhammānaṁ nibbuti
anya-e0401n0:70_8: kiriyāpi nibbānena vinā aññattha nasijjhatīti dassetuṁ ‘‘yehite’’tiādimāha. Tattha
anya-e0401n0:70_10: ‘‘Tabbinimutta’’nti nibbānavinimuttaṁ. Nibbutiṭhānaṁ nāma natthi. Tasmā nibbānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:70_11: tesaṁ nibbuti kiriyāya visayā dhārohotīti adhippāyo. Yathā ayaṁ padīpo nibbāyati.
anya-e0401n0:70_12: Tathādhīrā nibbantīti yojanā. ‘‘Taṁ taṁ kilesānaṁ vā’’ti te saṁtesaṁkilesānaṁ vā.
anya-e0401n0:70_14: santānassa puna paṭisandhānābhāvaṁ pāpuṇanti ariyā janā. Yathā magge karaṇavacanaṁ
anya-e0401n0:70_15: dissati addhā imāyapaṭipattiyā jarāmaraṇamhā parimuccissāmītiādīsu. Na tathā nibbāneti
anya-e0401n0:70_17: Asesaṁ uparujjhatītiādīsu. Tasmā nibbāne karaṇa vacanaṁ na dissati, karaṇa lakkhaṇasseva
anya-e0401n0:70_18: abhāvatoti dassetuṁ ‘‘na ca nibbāna’’ntiādi vuttaṁ. Karaṇa lakkhaṇaṁ nāmakattuno
anya-e0401n0:70_19: sahakārī paccayabhāvo. Nanu anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā nibbāyantīti dissatīti.
anya-e0401n0:70_20: Saccaṁ, tattha pana visesane karaṇa vacanaṁ. Na karaṇakārake. Tañhi saupādisesanibbānadhātuyānivattanatthaṁ vuttanti.
anya-e0401n0:73_2: avīcinirayādīsu uppannānaṁpi sattānaṁ. ‘‘Bhavanikanti nāma hotī’’ti bhavasaṅkhātaṁ
anya-e0401n0:73_3: attano khandhaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, esome attāti gaṇhantī taṇhā bhavanikanti nāma.
anya-e0401n0:73_4: Sā nerayikasattānaṁpi atthiyeva. ‘‘Kāme avacaratī’’ti kāmepariyāpannaṁ hoti. Kāme
anya-e0401n0:73_5: antogadhaṁ hoti. Rūpārūpabhūmīsu uppannaṁpi rūpārūpasaṅkhyaṁ nagacchati. Kāmasaṅkhyameva
anya-e0401n0:73_7: uppannānipi na tatrapariyā pannāneva honti. Tatra apariyāpannāneva hontīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:73_9: ime rūpāvacara dhammā na honti, arūpāvacara dhammā na honti, lokuttara dhammā na
anya-e0401n0:73_10: hontīti evaṁ vattabbatāpatti dosoti vuttaṁ hoti. Esanayo ‘‘rūpārūpāvacaratāpatti
anya-e0401n0:73_11: doso kāmāvacaratāmutti doso’’ tipadesu . Avacarasaddassa uppannatthe gahitepi etedosā
anya-e0401n0:73_12: nāpajjanti. Kasmā, loke yebhūyyanayatabbahulanayānaṁpi sabbhāvāti imamatthaṁ vadanto
anya-e0401n0:73_14: vā dhammānaṁ vā. Yathāmigaluddako gāme carantopi vane caraṇabahulattā vanacarakoti
anya-e0401n0:73_15: nāmaṁ labhati. Rājahatthī aññattha carantopi saṅgāme caraṇabahulattā saṅgāmāvacaroti
anya-e0401n0:73_16: nāmaṁ labhati. Ayaṁ yebhūyyanayo nāma. Yasmiṁ vane ambarukkhāpi atthi, aññarukkhāpi
anya-e0401n0:73_17: atthi. Ambarukkhabahulattā pana taṁ vanaṁ ambavananti nāmaṁ labhati. Evaṁ simbalivanādīsu.
anya-e0401n0:73_18: Ayaṁ tabbahulanayo. Idha pana bhūmiyo tabbahulanayena kāmarūpārūpa nāmaṁ labhanti,
anya-e0401n0:73_19: dhammā yebhūyyanayena kāmāvacarādi nāmaṁ labhantīti. Evaṁ gahite sati, te dosānā
anya-e0401n0:73_20: pajjantīti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘tasmā idhapi…pe… dosotī’’tiāha. ‘‘Nā’’ti na kocidoso
anya-e0401n0:73_21: natthi. Atthi evāti adhippāyo. ‘‘Tasmāssā’’ti ettha ‘‘assā’’ti avacarasaddassa. ‘‘Tathā
anya-e0401n0:73_22: atthaṁ aggahetvā’’ti uppajjanatthaṁ aggahetvā. ‘‘Pariggāhiniyā kāmataṇhāya kato’’ti
anya-e0401n0:73_23: tathā pariggāhiniyā kāmataṇhāya gocaravisayattātāyataṇhāya katonāma hoti. Etena kāmetīti
anya-e0401n0:73_24: kāmo, kāmataṇhā. Avacarati etthāti avacaraṁ. Kāmassa avacaranti kāmāvacaraṁ. Kāma
anya-e0401n0:74_1: tattha pariyāpannabhāvena pavattati. Arūpe avacaratīti arūpāvacaraṁ. ‘‘Arūpe’’ti
anya-e0401n0:74_3: imamatthaṁ vadati ‘‘rūpārūpāvacaresupi ayaṁnayo netabbo’’ti. Rūpe bhavo rūpaṁ. Rūpataṇhā.
anya-e0401n0:74_4: Arūpe bhavo arūpaṁ, arūpataṇhā. Rūpassa avacaraṁ rūpāvacaraṁ. Arūpassa avacaraṁ arūpāvacaranti
anya-e0401n0:74_5: imamatthaṁ dīpeti ‘‘tesu panā’’tiādinā. ‘‘Atrā’’ti imasmiṁ ṭhāne. Yadipi lobho, rāgo,
anya-e0401n0:74_6: kāmo, taṇhā, tisabbampetaṁ lobhassavevacanaṁ hoti. Rūparāgo arūparāgoti pana visuṁ
anya-e0401n0:74_7: vibhattattā idha kāmasaddena taṁ daññolobho gayhati. ‘‘Sabbopi lobho’’ti etenasassatuccheda
anya-e0401n0:75_0: 19. ‘‘Rūpārūpasaddā tāsu bhūmīsu niruḷhā’’ti animittā hutvā niruḷhāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n0:75_2: yathā sabbogāmo āgatoti. ‘‘Nissito pacāro’’ti ṭhānyūpacāro. Yathā dhajā āgacchantīti.
anya-e0401n0:75_3: ‘‘Yaṁ etasmiṁ antare’’ti ye etasmiṁ antare khandhadhātu āyatanā. Yaṁ rūpaṁ, yā vedanā,
anya-e0401n0:75_4: yāsaññā, ye saṅkhārā, yaṁviññāṇanti yojanā. ‘‘Suvisada’’nti yebhūyyādi nayehi anākulattāsuvisuddhaṁ.
anya-e0401n0:76_1: tebhūmake dhammasamūhe. ‘‘Nivisatī’’ti niccaṁ visati, upagacchati. ‘‘Tassā’’ti micchāggāhassa.
anya-e0401n0:76_4: Nibbānaṁ pana idha na labbhati cittasaṅgahādhikārattāti adhippāyo. So ca apariyāpannabhāvo,
anya-e0401n0:78_1: lobhādīhi pāpadhammehi yuttattā sabba cittehi hīnataraṁ. ‘‘Tadattho’’ti uparimānaṁ
anya-e0401n0:78_3: mama, esohamasmi, esome attāti evaṁ pavattassa bhavanikanti javanavīthicittassa vasena.
anya-e0401n0:78_4: Evañcasati, kiṁ kāraṇaṁ lobhamūlacittassapathamaṁ vacaneti āha ‘‘akusalesu panā’’tiādiṁ
anya-e0401n0:79_1: vutte kāyikasukhavedanāyapi pasaṅgo siyāti vuttaṁ ‘‘mānasika…pe… nāma’’nti. ‘‘Sumanābhidhānassā’’ti
anya-e0401n0:79_2: sumananāmassa. ‘‘Pavattinimitta’’nti pavattiyā āsanna kāraṇaṁ. Kathaṁ pana bhāvo
anya-e0401n0:79_3: pavattinimittaṁ nāmahotīti āha ‘‘bhavanti…pe… katvā’’ti. Nimitte bhummaṁ. Tathāhi
anya-e0401n0:79_4: bhāvo nāma saddappavattinimittanti vuttaṁ. Idāni nimitta lakkhaṇaṁ dassento ‘‘yathāhī’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n0:79_5: ‘‘Tatthā’’ti tasmiṁ payoge. ‘‘Danta nimitta’’nti dantakāraṇā. ‘‘Taṁ vedanā nimitta’’nti
anya-e0401n0:79_6: taṁ vedanākāraṇā. Ettha siyā, ‘‘etasminti nimitte bhumma’’nti vuttaṁ, nimittañcanāma
anya-e0401n0:79_7: akārakaṁ asādhanaṁ, taṁ kathaṁ sādhanaviggahe yujjatīti. Adhikaraṇa sādhanānurūpattā
anya-e0401n0:79_8: saddappavattinimittassāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Etenāti ca etasmāti ca hetu atthe ubhayavacananti
anya-e0401n0:79_9: vadanti. Āsannahetu nāmasādhanarūpo bhavatīti tesaṁ adhippāyo. Suṭṭhu karoti, pakatipaccayena
anya-e0401n0:79_10: anipphannaṁ kammaṁ attano balena nipphādetīti saṅkhāro. ‘‘Pubbābhisaṅkhāro’’ti pubbabhāge
anya-e0401n0:79_11: abhisaṅkhāro. Payojeti niyojetīti payogo. Upeti phalasaṅkhāto attho etenāti upāyo.
anya-e0401n0:79_13: bhayaṁ dassetvā vā. ‘‘Taṁ taṁ upāyaṁ pare ācikkha’’nti. Kathaṁ ācikkhantīti āha ‘‘akaraṇe’’tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n0:79_14: ‘‘Tasmiṁ tasmiṁ kamme payojetītikatvā idha saṅkhāro nāmā’’ti yojanā. ‘‘Paccaya gaṇo’’ti
anya-e0401n0:79_16: sādhāraṇo. ‘‘Duvidhena saṅkhārenā’’ti payogena vā upāyena vā. ‘‘Yo pana tenasahito’’tiādinā
anya-e0401n0:79_18: laddhaguṇa vacanaṁ. ‘‘Paccayagaṇassevanāma’’nti paccayagaṇasseva visesa nāmanti vuttaṁ
anya-e0401n0:79_19: hoti. Uppannatthe ikapaccayoti kathaṁ viññāyatīti āha ‘‘yasmiṁ samaye’’tiādiṁ. ‘‘Pāḷiya’’nti
anya-e0401n0:79_23: ‘‘So panā’’ti pubbappayogo pana. ‘‘Itī’’ti tasmā. ‘‘Taṁ nibbattito’’ti tena pubbappayogena
anya-e0401n0:79_25: Gāthāyaṁ. ‘‘Cittasambhavī’’ti cittasmiṁ sambhūto. Viseso saṅkhāro nāmāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:79_26: Salomako, sapakkhakotyādīsuviyāti vuttaṁ. Sāsavā dhammā, sārammaṇā dhammātyādīsuviyāti
anya-e0401n0:79_27: pana vutte yuttataraṁ. ‘‘Pāḷiaṭṭhakathā siddha’’nti pāḷiaṭṭhakathāto siddhaṁ. Apicayatthavisuddhimaggādīsu
anya-e0401n0:79_28: asaṅkhāraṁ cittaṁ, sasaṅkhāraṁ cittanti āgataṁ. Tattha ayaṁ pacchimanayo yutto. Upāyasamuṭṭhitassa
anya-e0401n0:79_30: ‘‘Yato’’ti yasmā. Vikārapatto hoti. Tato adhimattapassanaṁ viññāyatīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n0:80_1: pana te bhedavantā hontī’’ti kasmā vuttaṁ. Na nu tepicakkhu samphasso, sotasamphasso,
anya-e0401n0:80_2: tiādinā ca, kāmavitakko, byāpādavitakko, tiādinā ca, dukkhe aññāṇaṁ, dukkhasamudaye
anya-e0401n0:80_3: aññāṇa, ntiādināca bhedavantā hontīti. Saccaṁ. Te pana bhedā imaṁ cittaṁ bhinnaṁ
anya-e0401n0:80_4: na karonti. Tasmā te bhedavantāna hontīti vuttā. Na ca tesaṁ ayaṁ vikappo atthīti
anya-e0401n0:80_5: sambandho. ‘‘Imasmiṁ citte’’ti lobhamūlacitte. ‘‘Katthacī’’ti kismiñci citte. Yevāpanāti
anya-e0401n0:80_7: idha gahetabbānīti sambandho. ‘‘Nā’’ti na gahetabbāni. Kasmāti āha ‘‘tesuhī’’tiādiṁ
anya-e0401n0:80_8: . Tepi idha nagahetabbā siyuṁ. Na pana na gahetabbā. Kasmā, vedanāya ca sayaṁ bhedavantattā,
